NK106(me)006:1: // ma h+aa sa n+d+hi d+h+y+aa na pi sh+r+aa n+ta s+ya
NK106(me)006:2: bri t+t+ai ra tha bi shu d+d+ha ka n+aa ma
NK106(me)006:4: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa
NK106(me)006:5: shing rta rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
NK106(me)006:7: ma h+aa san+d+hi d+h+y+aa na bi sh+r+aan+ta s+ya brit+t+ai ra tha bi shud+d+ha ka n+aa ma /
NK106(me)006:9: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta rnam dag ces bya ba /
NK106(me)006:10: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)006:11: gang gi rang bzhin gdod nas nyer zhi spros dang bral ba'i mkha' dbyings la //
NK106(me)006:12: lhun gyis grub pa'i sku dang ye shes rang bzhin nye bar mdzes pa gang //
NK106(me)006:13: sna tshogs mdzad pa'i 'od stong 'phro bas gdul bya'i zhing gi rjes 'gro ba //
NK106(me)006:14: rgyal ba sras bcas mkhyen brtse'i nyi ma kun nas dga' ba'i gtsug gis mchod //
NK106(me)006:15: skal bzang skye bo thar pa'i grong khyer du //
NK106(me)006:16: gang gi lam nas nges par 'byung ba'i chos //
NK106(me)006:17: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul dag las //
NK106(me)006:18: shing rta rnam dag 'grel 'di rab gsal bya //
NK106(me)006:19: de la bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab rab 'byams thams cad kyi rtse mo ni /
NK106(me)006:20: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin la /
NK106(me)006:21: de'i gnas nges par gang zag gcig gis ji ltar nyams su blang ba'i rim pa nges pa ni /
NK106(me)006:22: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso zhes bya bar gtan la phab pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:23: 'dir de'i 'grel pas man ngag gi gnas gsal bar ston pa las /
NK106(me)006:24: re zhig dang por phyag 'tshal ba /
NK106(me)006:25: gdod ma'i rang bzhin mkha' mnyam dag pa'i dbyings //
NK106(me)006:26: chos mchog mi g.yo shin tu spros dang bral //
NK106(me)006:27: 'od gsal sems nyid byang chub snying po la //
NK106(me)006:28: gzhi rdzogs 'pho 'gyur med pas phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)006:29: de la rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhi ni /
NK106(me)006:30: sems nyid rang byung gi ye shes g.yo med spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang bral ba ste /
NK106(me)006:31: ngo bo la dbye bsal thams cad dang bral ba'i rang bzhin /
NK106(me)006:32: stong la go 'byed pa'i nam mkha' lta bu /
NK106(me)006:33: gsal la 'grib pa med pa'i nyi zla lta bu /
NK106(me)006:34: yon tan lhun gyis grub pa'i nor bu lta bu ste /
NK106(me)006:35: 'khor 'das gang du'ang ma grub la gang du'ang 'char ba'i gazhi'am dbyings su gnas pa de la /
NK106(me)006:36: rig pa rang ngo shes pas gzhi 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don gyis phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK106(me)006:38: kye ston pa'i bstan pa kun byed rgyal po khyod //
NK106(me)006:39: dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings //
NK106(me)006:40: 'khor ba mi spang thugs rje phyogs ris med //
NK106(me)006:41: ston pa kun byed rgyal po khyod la 'dud //
NK106(me)006:44: sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te //
NK106(me)006:45: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba //
NK106(me)006:46: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi //
NK106(me)006:47: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)006:50: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
NK106(me)006:51: mar la mar ni rjes zhugs ltar //
NK106(me)006:52: rang gi rang rig ye shes ni //
NK106(me)006:53: legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
NK106(me)006:55: brtsam par dam bca' ba ni /
NK106(me)006:56: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa shin tu rmad byung gang //
NK106(me)006:57: so so rang rig ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir //
NK106(me)006:58: rgyud lung man ngag snying po'i bcud bsdus te //
NK106(me)006:59: ji ltar nyams su blangs bzhin bshad kyis nyon //
NK106(me)006:60: de la so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes ni /
NK106(me)006:61: man ngag 'di'i brjod bya yin pas /
NK106(me)006:62: de'i don rang gis ji ltar nyams su blangs pa
NK106(me)006:63: ltar phyi rabs kyi don du brjod par bya ste
NK106(me)006:64: / don 'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:66: rgyal ba 'das dang ma byon phyogs bcur gang bzhugs pa //
NK106(me)006:67: kun lam pha rol phyin pa 'di yin gzhan ma yin //
NK106(me)006:69: de nyid kyang yum la bstod pa las /
NK106(me)006:70: smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK106(me)006:71: ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK106(me)006:72: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
NK106(me)006:73: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK106(me)006:75: 'dir rdzogs pa chen po ston pa la pha rol tu phyin pas ci bya zhe na /
NK106(me)006:76: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rdzogs pa chen po yin te /
NK106(me)006:77: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi rig pa'i ngor btags pa de nyid las byung ba'i phyir te /
NK106(me)006:79: kye nga ni ma bcos ji bzhin snying po la //
NK106(me)006:80: sgro 'dogs skur 'debs don las kun 'das te //
NK106(me)006:81: dus gsum rgyal ba nga las byung bas na //
NK106(me)006:82: rgyal ba'i yum zhes nges par bstan pa yin //
NK106(me)006:84: de dag gis phyogs dang po bstan bcos brtsam pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu bstan to //
NK106(me)006:85: da ni lus nyid bshad pa la mdo dang /
NK106(me)006:86: rgyas par bstan pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)006:87: dang po man ngag gi lus kyi sdom bsdu bas mdor bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:88: ri rtse nags khrod mtsho gling la sogs pa //
NK106(me)006:89: dus bzhi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
NK106(me)006:90: rtse gcig mi g.yo zhi ba'i ting 'dzin ni //
NK106(me)006:91: 'od gsal spros dang bral ba bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)006:92: gnas dang gang zag nyams su blang bya'i chos //
NK106(me)006:93: rnam gsum rang bzhin dag las 'grub par 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:94: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis dus bzhi yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su /
NK106(me)006:95: zab mo'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pas 'grub par nges pa yang /
NK106(me)006:96: gang du bsgrub pa'i gnas dang /
NK106(me)006:97: gang gis bsgrubs pa'i gang zag dang /
NK106(me)006:98: gang sgrub pa'i chos dang gsum gyis cho ga rdzogs
NK106(me)006:99: par 'grub pa na rdo rje'i lus rnam par gzhag
NK106(me)006:100: pa'o // da ni de dag gi rim pa rgyas par bshad pa las /
NK106(me)006:101: phyogs dang po gang du bsgrub pa'i gnas las /
NK106(me)006:102: dus bzhi gnas kyi rim pa bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:103: dang po gnas ni dben zhing nyams dga' bar //
NK106(me)006:104: dus bzhi'i rnal 'byor dag dang mthun pa ste //
NK106(me)006:105: dbyar ni gangs dang ri rtse la sogs par //
NK106(me)006:106: smyug ma 'od ma 'jag khang la sogs pa //
NK106(me)006:107: bsil sar bsil khang nang du bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)006:108: ston ni nags khrod ri ngogs brag rdzong sogs //
NK106(me)006:109: bsil drod snyoms pa'i gnas dang khung bu ru //
NK106(me)006:110: zas gos spyod lam de dang mthun par bya //
NK106(me)006:111: dgun ni nags khrod brag phug sa khang sogs //
NK106(me)006:112: dma' ba'i gnas dang dro ba'i sa phyogs su //
NK106(me)006:113: zas gos mal cha la sogs rjes mthun bya //
NK106(me)006:114: dpyid ni ri dang nags 'dab mtsho gling sogs //
NK106(me)006:115: bsil drod snyoms par rjes mthun khang pa ru //
NK106(me)006:116: zas gos spyod lam mthun pa shin tu gces //
NK106(me)006:117: 'di dag ni slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo
NK106(me)006:118: rjes mdzad pa'i dus bzhi rnal 'byor gyi sgrub pa
NK106(me)006:119: zab mo las byu nga ba bzhin te /
NK106(me)006:120: dbyar ni me'i dus te phyi nang gi 'byung ba
NK106(me)006:121: kun dro bas gnas dang spyod lam bsil bar bsten
NK106(me)006:122: cing / ston ni rlung gi dus te phyi nang
NK106(me)006:123: gi 'byung ba kun smin pas dngas gsal phyed pa'i
NK106(me)006:124: gnas dang spyod lam bstan par bya la /
NK106(me)006:125: dgun ni chu'i dus te phyi nang gi 'byung ba
NK106(me)006:126: kun bsil bas gnas dang spyod lam kun dro ba
NK106(me)006:127: bsten cing / dpyid ni sa'i dus te phyi nang
NK106(me)006:128: gi 'byung ba kun bskyed par phyogs pas bsil drod
NK106(me)006:129: snyoms pa'i gnas dang spyod lam gces te /
NK106(me)006:130: phyi nang rten 'brel gyi 'khor lo gnyis su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:132: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
NK106(me)006:134: de nas gang la shis pa gnas kyi khyad par bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:135: phyi nang rten 'brel gcig pas de phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:136: yid 'ong dben la nyams dag'i gnas la brten //
NK106(me)006:137: ri rtse shes pa dngas la rgya che bas //
NK106(me)006:138: bying ba gseng ba'i gnas de bskyed rim shis //
NK106(me)006:139: gangs khrod bskyed rim gsal zhing rig pa dngas //
NK106(me)006:140: lhag mthong bsgom pa'i gnas yin bar chad nyung //
NK106(me)006:141: nags khrod shes pa gnas shing sems gnas skye //
NK106(me)006:142: zhi gnas bsgom pa'i gnas te bde shas che //
NK106(me)006:143: brag ri'i drung ni mi rtag skyo shas che //
NK106(me)006:144: dngas la byin che zhi lhag zung 'brel 'grub //
NK106(me)006:145: chu bo'i 'gram ni blo sna thung ba ste //
NK106(me)006:146: nges 'byung skyo shas gsar du skye bar byed //
NK106(me)006:147: dur khrod byin che dngos grub myur ba ste //
NK106(me)006:148: bskyed rdzogs gang la'ang mchog tu shis par gsungs //
NK106(me)006:149: gnas 'di dag kyang las dang po pa dang /
NK106(me)006:151: yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag gis ji skad smos pa'i mtshams spyod shes pa bsten na /
NK106(me)006:152: lta ba dang sgom pa khyad par can gong 'phel du 'grub ste /
NK106(me)006:153: gnas de dag gi yon tan lam 'grub pa'i grogs su shar ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:154: gang zag rang gi nyams dang sbyar te shes par bya ba'i gnas bsten pa ni /
NK106(me)006:155: grong dang tshong dus khang stong shing gcig sogs //
NK106(me)006:156: mi dang mi min 'byung po rgyu ba ni //
NK106(me)006:157: las dang po la g.yeng zhing bar du gcod //
NK106(me)006:158: brtan pa rnams la grogs te mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)006:159: lha khang mchod rten rgyal 'gong gnas sa ni //
NK106(me)006:160: sems 'tshubs zhe sdang rtog tshogs skye ba ste //
NK106(me)006:161: sa phug la sogs bsen mo'i gnas rnams su //
NK106(me)006:162: 'dod chags skye zhing bying rgod lhag par che //
NK106(me)006:163: shing gcig la sogs ma mo mkha' 'gro dang //
NK106(me)006:164: brag dang ri sna dmu btsan the'u rang gnas //
NK106(me)006:165: sems 'tshubs rkyen dang bar chad mang bar 'dod //
NK106(me)006:166: gdol ba klu gnyan sa bdag gnas pa ni //
NK106(me)006:167: mtsho 'gram ne'u gseng nags khrod sman ljongs sogs //
NK106(me)006:168: yid dga' me tog ljon shing brgyan pa ni //
NK106(me)006:169: dang por dga' yang phyis nas bar chad mang //
NK106(me)006:170: de la 'jig rten pa'i lha 'dre ma rungs pa gnas pas /
NK106(me)006:171: de dag ni rnal 'byor pa nyams brtan nas spyod pa byed pa'i gnas las /
NK106(me)006:172: las dang po pa bsgom pa dang rgyun du gnas
NK106(me)006:173: bcas nas 'dug tu rung ba ni ma yin pas
NK106(me)006:174: dor bar bya ba kho na'o //
NK106(me)006:175: rtag tu gnas pa de lha btsan dang /
NK106(me)006:176: klu sman dang dkar po'i phyogs la dga' ba'i mi ma yin gnas pa'i sar bzang ste /
NK106(me)006:177: mthun rkyen 'grub cing 'gal rkyen mi 'byung bar bsrung ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:180: gnas khang dang po nyams dga' la //
NK106(me)006:181: 'dris shing mi dga' dngos grub chung ba'i gnas //
NK106(me)006:182: dang por 'jigs la mi dga' 'dris shing dga' //
NK106(me)006:183: byin che dngos grub myur la bar chad med //
NK106(me)006:184: de las gzhan kun bar ma phan gnod med //
NK106(me)006:185: 'di ni gnad gal po che ste /
NK106(me)006:186: zla ba phyed du brtags pas shes par nges so //
NK106(me)006:187: de phyir gnas la brten nas nang gi sems 'gyur zhing //
NK106(me)006:188: dge ba'i sbyor ba 'phel 'grib gnyis yod pas //
NK106(me)006:189: sa gnas brtags pa shin tu gces par gsungs //
NK106(me)006:190: de yang gsang sngags lam rim las /
NK106(me)006:191: gnas kyi mtshan nyid la dge sbyor 'phel ba dang
NK106(me)006:192: mi 'phel ba gnyis gnyis su yod do zhes 'byung
NK106(me)006:193: ba bzhin no // da ni las bzhi gnas kyi rim pa mdor bsdu ba ni /
NK106(me)006:194: de yang bsdu na las bzhi'i gnas kyang bzhi //
NK106(me)006:195: zhi gnas yid ni lhan gyis 'dzin pa ste //
NK106(me)006:196: rgyas gnas yid dga' gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan //
NK106(me)006:197: dbang gnas yid 'phrog chags dang ldan pa ste //
NK106(me)006:198: drag gnas sems 'tshubs 'jigs dngangs skye bar byed //
NK106(me)006:199: dbye na rnam grangs dpag med mtha' las 'das //
NK106(me)006:200: 'dir ni ting 'dzin zhi ba'i gnas mchog ste //
NK106(me)006:201: gzhan rnams yi ges 'jigs nas ma spros so //
NK106(me)006:202: phyi'i yul du snang ba'i gnas rnams kyang phrin las bzhi'i dbyings su gnas pa la /
NK106(me)006:203: zhi ba'i gnas ni sems rang bzhin gyis phebs la
NK106(me)006:204: mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin ngang gis skye ba'o
NK106(me)006:205: // rgyas pa'i gnas ni sa phyogs gzi brjid che la sems dga' bas g.yeng ba'o //
NK106(me)006:206: dbang gi gnas ni yid la 'dod chags skyed par byed pa'o //
NK106(me)006:207: drag po'i gnas ni 'jigs la bag dro ba ste /
NK106(me)006:215: ljang nag shes che ba ste /
NK106(me)006:216: de dag kyang zhi ba'i zhi ba la sogs pa'i dbye na bcu drug las /
NK106(me)006:217: yang dbye na dpag tu med de spros pas chog go //
NK106(me)006:218: 'dir ni zhi ba'i gnas ting nge 'dzin 'phel ba la brten par gdams pa yin no //
NK106(me)006:219: gnas der bya ba bkod pa'i rim pa ni /
NK106(me)006:220: zhi ba'i gnas der bsam gtan khang bu yang //
NK106(me)006:221: dben la yid 'dzin bkod par 'tshams pa ste //
NK106(me)006:222: phyogs med mthongs gsal che ba rab tu shis //
NK106(me)006:223: de la bsam gtan gyi khang bu phyogs phyed la
NK106(me)006:224: mthongs gsal ba ni ting nge 'dzin ngang gis skye
NK106(me)006:226: khyad par du nyin mtshan gyi dge sbyor tha dad pas de'i gnas bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:227: mtshan mo'i rnal 'byor mun khang 'khor ma ste //
NK106(me)006:228: mtho sar 'khor khang nang du lte ba'i tshul //
NK106(me)006:229: byang du sngas gtad mya ngan 'das gzims bzhin //
NK106(me)006:230: nyin mo'i gnas ni snang ba'i rnal 'byor pa //
NK106(me)006:231: gangs dang chu 'bab nags dang yul la sogs //
NK106(me)006:232: khyams kyi mthongs gsal che zhing nam mkha' yangs //
NK106(me)006:233: sems gsal dngas la bsil drod snyoms par bya //
NK106(me)006:234: phyogs pa'i dus su mun khang 'khor ma bya ba ni /
NK106(me)006:235: kha cig nyi ma 'khor lo ltar 'dod kyang 'gro 'dug rab tu mi bde ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:236: 'dir ni dbus kyi lte ba la 'khor khang nyis
NK106(me)006:237: rim gyis bskor ba'i sgo shar dang lho dang nub
NK106(me)006:239: lte ba'i phyogs re la 'dom re mda' re byas la /
NK106(me)006:241: 'khor khang gi bskor ba nang ma de sgo lhor
NK106(me)006:242: bstan pa'i phyir 'khor khang shar du sgo bstan pa'i
NK106(me)006:243: phyogs bzhi'i thad drang nas skar khung bzhi bzhi btod
NK106(me)006:244: pas dus gzhan du snang ba gsal te /
NK106(me)006:245: bskor ba la sogs dgos na'ang nye bar mkho ba yin no //
NK106(me)006:246: nang du yang dag 'jog cing gnas pa'i tshe bkag nas /
NK106(me)006:247: byang du sgo dang kha blta bar byas la bsgom par bya'o //
NK106(me)006:248: nyin mo'i gnas ni 'khor khang de dag gi steng du phyed phibs lhor blta ba /
NK106(me)006:249: mthongs gsal rab tu che bar bsgoms pas ting nge 'dzin mchog tu gsal lo //
NK106(me)006:250: der zhi gnas thun mong ba'i gnas bya ba ni /
NK106(me)006:251: zhi gnas dus su dben khang ra bas bskor //
NK106(me)006:252: ngang gis sems gnas skye ba'i gnas la shis //
NK106(me)006:253: lhag mthong dus su mthongs gsal dngas pa gces //
NK106(me)006:254: rgyun du yid dga' dus dang mthun par bya //
NK106(me)006:255: dben khang de'i phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhi'i gang rung cig gi cha la /
NK106(me)006:256: dbye thang sa yangs phyam gyis 'ong ba'i mtha' shing
NK106(me)006:257: la sogs pa'i ra bas sked nub tu bskor bas
NK106(me)006:258: zhi gnas ngang gis skye ba'o //
NK106(me)006:259: sa phyogs de'i mtho sar khri chung ngu rgyang ring
NK106(me)006:260: po mthong sa la 'dug pas lhag mthong ngang gis
NK106(me)006:262: zhi lhag skye ba'i sa phyogs bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)006:263: nags rong la sogs dma' zhing 'thibs pa ni //
NK106(me)006:264: zhi gnas gnas yin gangs sogs mtho sa nyid //
NK106(me)006:265: lhag mthong gnas yin bye brag shes pa gces //
NK106(me)006:266: phyogs gang zhig gnas la shing nags dang brag ri
NK106(me)006:267: skal la sogs pa ste yid nang du gnas pa'i
NK106(me)006:268: phyogs rnams zhi gnas kyi don bsgom par shis la
NK106(me)006:269: / phyogs mtho zhing rig pa dngas yangs phyed pa
NK106(me)006:270: thams cad lhag mthong gi gnas su shes par bya'o
NK106(me)006:271: / // da ni ji skad bshad pa'i gnas la blang dor shes pas don bsdu ba ni /
NK106(me)006:272: mdor na sa phyogs dang ni dben khang nyid //
NK106(me)006:273: gang du nges 'byung skyo shas blo sna thung //
NK106(me)006:274: ting 'dzin 'phel bas dge la sbyor ba'i gnas //
NK106(me)006:275: snying po byang chub gnas dang mtshungs pas bsten //
NK106(me)006:276: gang du gnas pas dge 'grib nyon mongs 'phel //
NK106(me)006:277: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi tshe 'di'i dbang gyur na //
NK106(me)006:278: las ngan bdud kyi gnas te mkhas pas spang //
NK106(me)006:279: 'di dag rang byung pad+mas gsungs de'i phyir //
NK106(me)006:280: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis shes par bya //
NK106(me)006:281: de la phyogs dang gnas khang gang du dge ba'i chos gong du 'phel zhing //
NK106(me)006:282: dad pa dang nges 'byung khyad par can skye ba
NK106(me)006:283: de ni snying po byang chub kyi gnas dang 'dra
NK106(me)006:285: gang du rtsod pa dang nyon mongs pa 'phel zhing
NK106(me)006:286: tshe 'di'i rnam g.yeng dang 'du 'dzi 'phel ba de
NK106(me)006:287: las ngan bdud kyi gnas su shes pas spang bar
NK106(me)006:288: bya ste / slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis man ngag lta ba'i rdzong phreng du /
NK106(me)006:289: chos byed pa la gnas kyang gal che bas gang
NK106(me)006:290: du dge ba dang ting nge 'dzin dam pa grub
NK106(me)006:291: na de bas lhag pa gzhan du mi rnyed pas
NK106(me)006:293: gang du rtsod pa dang mi dge ba 'phel na
NK106(me)006:294: thar pa'i lam la bar du gcod pas spang ba
NK106(me)006:295: la 'bad do zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
NK106(me)006:296: rang bzhin nye bar zhi ba'i sa phyogs su //
NK106(me)006:297: chu gtsang dka' thub dpal gyis nyer 'tsho zhing //
NK106(me)006:298: tshe 'di'i rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi kun spangs nas //
NK106(me)006:299: ting 'dzin zab mo'i chos nyid bsgom par shog /
NK106(me)006:300: sna tshogs 'char ba'i sdug bsngal kun la gnas //
NK106(me)006:301: 'khor ba'i grong khyer ra ba kun spangs te //
NK106(me)006:302: thar pa zhi ba byang chub dam pa'i gnas //
NK106(me)006:303: mya ngan 'das tshal bde ba thob par shog /
NK106(me)006:304: ding sang 'gro la bdag 'dras phan pa med //
NK106(me)006:305: dus ngan 'khor dang 'jig rten snang ba dang //
NK106(me)006:306: tshe 'di'i rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi kun spangs te //
NK106(me)006:307: sbas yul rin chen sgo bzhi 'byed par shog /
NK106(me)006:308: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta rnam dag las /
NK106(me)006:309: ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i sa phyogs bstan pa ste rdo rje'i gnas dang po'o ////
NK106(me)006:310: da ni gang gis bsgom pa'i gang zag bstan pa las /
NK106(me)006:311: mtshams bcad rgya dang ldan pa snod kyi 'jig rten bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)006:312: gnyis pa nyams su len pa'i gang zag kyang //
NK106(me)006:313: dad brtson nges 'byung skyo shas dang ldan zhing //
NK106(me)006:314: 'khor bas skyo la thar pa don du gnyer //
NK106(me)006:315: tshe 'di blos btang phyi ma byang chub 'dod //
NK106(me)006:316: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi rgyang bsrings nyon mongs chung //
NK106(me)006:317: khong yangs spro ring dag snang mos gus che //
NK106(me)006:318: bstan la sri zhur ldan pa de dag gis //
NK106(me)006:319: thar pa'i mchog ste de nyid bsgrub par bya'o //
NK106(me)006:320: de la dad brtson nges 'byung dang ldan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:321: chos kyi zhing sa dang 'dra bas med pa'i thabs med /
NK106(me)006:322: 'khor bar skyo shas dang ldan pa ni chos kyi
NK106(me)006:323: 'jug sgo yin pas thar lam snyag pa la dgos
NK106(me)006:324: / zhi bde don gnyer dang ldan pa ni byang chub kyi sa bon dang 'dra /
NK106(me)006:325: tshe 'di blos btang gi zhen log ni 'khor ba las nges par 'byin pa'i thabs su 'gyur /
NK106(me)006:326: gtan gyi byang chub 'dod pa ni rkyen gsum gyi chu lud dang 'dra /
NK106(me)006:327: 'du 'dzi nyon mongs las dben pa ni 'gal rkyen rang log gi gdams ngag tu shar /
NK106(me)006:328: dag snang mos gus dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i
NK106(me)006:329: lo thog gong 'phel gyi rgyu rkyen lhun gyis grub
NK106(me)006:330: / blo brtan sri zhu dang ldan pa ni thar
NK106(me)006:331: lam gyi 'bras bu myur du smin par byed pas
NK106(me)006:332: na snod kyi mchog tu shes par bya'o //
NK106(me)006:335: dad dang dam tshig brtson 'grus che ba dang //
NK106(me)006:336: snying rje yi rang skyo dang yid ldog med //
NK106(me)006:337: lus dang bu dang chung ma bran dang 'khor //
NK106(me)006:338: gang la'ang ma chags dad dang dga' bas 'bul //
NK106(me)006:339: 'di dag dad dang dam tshig rgya yin pas //
NK106(me)006:340: snying po'i don dang ldan pa sbyin par bya //
NK106(me)006:342: zhar la spang bya'i snod kyang de nyid las //
NK106(me)006:343: snod min log pa'i gang zag bstan pa ni //
NK106(me)006:344: grags dang 'jig rten chos la dga' ba dang //
NK106(me)006:345: nga rgyal dam pa mi bkur yid thung ldog /'phyar zhing rdzas dang dad par mi ldan te //
NK106(me)006:346: rang tshod nyams len btsan thabs 'dod pa dang //
NK106(me)006:347: bstan pa yongs la 'phel zhing mi mthun zhing //
NK106(me)006:348: sgro skur bdag gzhan gnod sems bsgom pa ste //
NK106(me)006:349: 'di la mi bstan mchog tu gsang bar bya //
NK106(me)006:351: snod dang ldan pas ji ltar bya ba'i chos bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:352: dam pa'i bla ma rab tu mnyes byas te //
NK106(me)006:353: thos bsam sgom pas rang gi sems sbyangs shing //
NK106(me)006:354: khyad par snyan brgyud snying po'i man ngag la //
NK106(me)006:355: brtson la rgyun ring sgrub pas nyin mtshan 'da' //
NK106(me)006:356: tha mal phyogs su skad cig ma yengs par //
NK106(me)006:357: gang zag snying po'i don la nan tan bya //
NK106(me)006:358: de la thar pa'i sgor bla ma dam pa'i 'dzud pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:359: dngos grub 'dod pas bla ma mnyes par byas la /
NK106(me)006:360: thos bsam sgom pa dang bstun rgyud snying por sgrub pas ma yengs par nan tan bya ste /
NK106(me)006:361: dpal 'byung bzhi zad pa'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)006:362: dngos grub 'dod pa'i dad pa can //
NK106(me)006:363: dngos grub bla ma mnyes las 'byung //
NK106(me)006:364: de bas bdog pa thams cad kyis //
NK106(me)006:365: bla ma mchod la yang dag brtson //
NK106(me)006:367: de nas thar lam gyi gzhi 'dings pa ni /
NK106(me)006:368: nyan thos byang chub sems dang rig pa 'dzin //
NK106(me)006:369: sdom pa gsum po dag dang ma 'gal bar //
NK106(me)006:370: rang rgyud sdom zhing gzhan phan ci 'grub dang //
NK106(me)006:371: cir snang thar pa'i lam du bsgyur bar bya //
NK106(me)006:372: de la gang nas bsgrubs kyang sdom pa gsum la bslab ste /
NK106(me)006:373: nyan thos kyi byang chub 'dod pas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa dang /
NK106(me)006:374: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med gsum la
NK106(me)006:375: sogs pa na 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
NK106(me)006:377: tshe gcig la sogs par myur du sangs rgyas 'dod
NK106(me)006:378: pas gsang sngags kyi sdom pa la gnas pa ste
NK106(me)006:379: / de dag kyang yon tan gyi rdzas yar ldan
NK106(me)006:380: du 'du zhing ming gi ldog pa tha dad du
NK106(me)006:381: / gnas pa'i phyir / tshul khrims 'di gsum rten du gsungs te /
NK106(me)006:383: khrims ni rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sa bzhin du //
NK106(me)006:384: yon tan kun gyi gzhi rten lags par gsungs //
NK106(me)006:386: de la spyir rnam grol gyi byang chub lam du byed pa la sdom pa thob dgos /
NK106(me)006:387: sdom pas ma bsdams pa'i dge ba thams cad bar ma dge ba ste /
NK106(me)006:388: 'khor ba'i gnas las 'da' mi nus so //
NK106(me)006:389: de la so thar gyi sdom pa lam ma nor
NK106(me)006:390: zhing phun sum tshogs par bsgrubs na nyan rang gi
NK106(me)006:391: byang chub thob pas 'khor bar mi 'khyam /
NK106(me)006:392: byang sems kyi sdom pas grangs med gsum na sangs rgya /
NK106(me)006:393: sngags kyi sdom pas tshe gcig na sangs rgya'o //
NK106(me)006:394: sdom pa gsum yang bcas pa'i ltung ba yin pas /
NK106(me)006:395: sdom pa med pa la bsod nams dang ltung ba gnyis ka med /
NK106(me)006:396: zhing med na ston thog dang sad ser gang yang mi 'byung ba bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:397: de la sdom pa gsum gyi go don bzhag na /
NK106(me)006:398: sems nyon mongs mi dge bas ma sbags par sdom pas so thar /
NK106(me)006:399: dge ba rgyun chags kyi gzhan don byed pas byang sems /
NK106(me)006:400: rang gzhan lha dang gzhal med khang du gsal bas
NK106(me)006:401: don gnyis lhun grub tu byed cing 'dod yon lam
NK106(me)006:402: du bsgyur ba gsang sngags rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom
NK106(me)006:403: pa'o // de dag kyang gnod pa gzhi bcas las log pa /
NK106(me)006:405: dag mnyam dkyil 'khor gcig gi ngang las mi 'da' bar spyod pa'o //
NK106(me)006:406: gang zag gcig gi rgyud la ji ltar bsrung ba la /
NK106(me)006:407: kha cig sna tshogs lam sna zin gyi bar so thar bsrung /
NK106(me)006:408: de nas sbyor lam drod ma skyes kyi bar byang sems bsrung /
NK106(me)006:409: de nas sngags 'ba' zhig bsrung zer ba mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)006:410: rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa la las dang
NK106(me)006:411: po pa'i dus nas sdom pa sum ldan du byas
NK106(me)006:413: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
NK106(me)006:414: sdom pa thams cad ldan pa ni //
NK106(me)006:415: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
NK106(me)006:417: kha cig gnas 'gyur du bsrung zer te /
NK106(me)006:418: zangs rdo bzhu ba la zangs /
NK106(me)006:419: rag rdo blugs na ra gan /
NK106(me)006:420: zha ne blugs na 'khar bar 'gro ba bzhin /
NK106(me)006:421: gang ma thob na 'og ma gnas 'gyur te /
NK106(me)006:422: sngags gcig pu bsrungs pa chog zer ba mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)006:423: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)006:424: khyad du gsod pa ni rang bzhin zhes 'og ma khyad du gsod na ltung bar gsung zhing /
NK106(me)006:425: sdom pa thams cad bsrung bar bshad pas gnod do //
NK106(me)006:426: la la bag la zhar 'dod pa'ang mi 'dod de /
NK106(me)006:427: yar zha'am mar zha ste sdom gsum mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:428: rdzas ldog thams cad gcig par 'dod pa'ang mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)006:429: dang po rgyu tshogs gcig las skyes pa /
NK106(me)006:430: bar du 'gal bar mi gnas pa /
NK106(me)006:431: tha ma sgrub sde gcig pa ste chos gsum tshang
NK106(me)006:432: bas rdzas ldog dang snga phyi thams cad du gcig
NK106(me)006:433: pa med do // la la gtong thob tu 'dod pa'ang mi 'thad de /
NK106(me)006:434: gong ma thob pas 'og ma gtong bar bshad pa gang na'ang med do //
NK106(me)006:436: gang zag gcig gi rgyud la sum ldan du bsrung ba la /
NK106(me)006:437: rang ldog ma 'dres dgag dgos yongs rdzogs /
NK106(me)006:441: dus skabs kyi gtso bor gang 'gyur bar bya ba dang drug go //
NK106(me)006:442: dang po rang ldog ma 'dres te /
NK106(me)006:444: dgag dgos yongs rdzogs ni thams cad log la mkhar rtsigs zer ba bzhin /
NK106(me)006:445: sdom pa gsum kas rgyud gcig po de'i dge ba sdom par gcig ste /
NK106(me)006:447: chos gang zhig dngos dang brgyud nas kun tu 'dod chags pa'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
NK106(me)006:448: kun du 'dod chags dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni chos ma yin /
NK106(me)006:450: ston pa'i bstan pa ma yin par shes par gyis shig /
NK106(me)006:451: chos gang zhig dngos dang brgyud nas kun tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
NK106(me)006:452: kun du 'dod chags pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ba 'di ni chos yin /
NK106(me)006:454: ston pa'i bstan pa yin par shes par gyis shig /
NK106(me)006:455: de bzhin du zhe sdang la sogs pa'i bar mang du gsungs so //
NK106(me)006:456: de'ang tshangs spyod la gnas pa'i dge slong dang /
NK106(me)006:457: dbang gsum pa'i lam gyi rnal 'byor pa gnyis gnad gcig ste /
NK106(me)006:458: nus pa yod bzhin mi spyod pas 'dod pa'i dri mas ma gos pa dang /
NK106(me)006:459: spyad bzhin dri mas ma gos pa gnyis ka'ang nyon
NK106(me)006:460: mongs pa de nyid la brten nas sdom pa rdzogs
NK106(me)006:461: par byed pa'i dgag dgos gnad gcig pa'i phyir ro
NK106(me)006:462: // rnam pa thams cad du mi spyod pa nyid
NK106(me)006:463: gtso bo yin na ma ning dang bu chung la
NK106(me)006:464: sdom pa lhag par skye bar rigs so //
NK106(me)006:465: yang so thar dang dbang gsum po dngos 'gal du
NK106(me)006:466: gnas pa yin na sngags kyi rten khyim pa kho
NK106(me)006:469: rten gsum las ni dge slong mchog /
NK106(me)006:472: rigs kyi bu yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi ma
NK106(me)006:473: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu
NK106(me)006:474: byung ba / so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la
NK106(me)006:475: gnas pa gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i yid kyis
NK106(me)006:476: byung ba / sngar brten nam / brten par spro'am zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:478: sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa gang //
NK106(me)006:479: e wam rnam par rab tu gnas //
NK106(me)006:480: e wam rnam pa'i bde chen po //
NK106(me)006:481: dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:483: 'dod chags me yis tshig pa la //
NK106(me)006:487: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
NK106(me)006:488: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa //
NK106(me)006:490: mdor na so thar gyis spangs /
NK106(me)006:492: sngags kyis lam du byed pa gsum yang /
NK106(me)006:493: nyon mongs rang mtshan pa spong bar gcig ste /
NK106(me)006:496: sngags kyis btab ste za ba gsum dug rang mtshan pa spong ba dang /
NK106(me)006:497: dug gis mi 'chi ba'i dgos pa bsgrub par gcig pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:498: ltung ba nang 'dzom na sdig to mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi ltung ba rnams so thar bzhin bsrung /
NK106(me)006:499: 'dod pas dben pa'i ltung ba rnams gong ma ltar bsrung /
NK106(me)006:500: 'jig rten ma dad pa'i phyogs gnyis kar bkag pa rnams thams cad du 'bad de bsrung bar bya'o //
NK106(me)006:501: rdo rje theg pa'i dge slong gi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med cing /
NK106(me)006:502: dus tshod dang 'brel par byed dgos pas /
NK106(me)006:503: nyams myong ma skyes kyi bar du thun mong gi sdom pa gtso bor bsrung /
NK106(me)006:504: nyams myong skyes pa dang spyod pa phyi nang gnyis su phye la /
NK106(me)006:505: gsang spyod kyi dus su dbang tshogs 'khor bsnyen sgrub gnyis /
NK106(me)006:506: rang gzhan byin gyis brlabs pa'i dus bzhi /
NK106(me)006:507: sngags kyi sdom pa gtso bor nyams su blangs pas /
NK106(me)006:508: 'og ma gnyis kyi'ang dgag dgos yar ldan du 'gro /
NK106(me)006:509: dbang gsum pa lta bu la'ang rang rgyud kyis chags
NK106(me)006:510: pa dang ma bral na sngags kyi lam du mi
NK106(me)006:511: 'gro la / thig le 'dzag med du brtan /
NK106(me)006:512: tha mal sgo gsum 'dzin pa dang bral tsam na /
NK106(me)006:513: mi tshangs spyod kyi ltung ba gzhi med de /
NK106(me)006:514: dgag cha 'dod chags rang mtshan pa log pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:515: gser dang rdo la khyad par med na gser la reg pas ltung ba med pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:516: 'di ni dngos po gtso bor ltung ba yin pas
NK106(me)006:517: pags rim 'das pas ltung ba 'byung ngo zhe na
NK106(me)006:518: / de ni thabs la mi mkhas shing shes rab med pa'i dbang du byas pa ste /
NK106(me)006:519: yang dag par na dngos po dang bsam pa khyad
NK106(me)006:520: par med cing dbyer med pas thabs shes rab khyad
NK106(me)006:521: par can gyis zin pa'i phyir nyes pa med de
NK106(me)006:522: / sngags med pa'i dug gis 'chi yang /
NK106(me)006:523: sngags dang ldan pa la nyes pa med pa lta bu ste /
NK106(me)006:525: sgyu mar shes pa mig yor tshul //
NK106(me)006:526: sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang //
NK106(me)006:527: rdul cha tsam yang gos pa med //
NK106(me)006:529: des na nyan thos kyi dge slong la de kho na nyid ltar yin la /
NK106(me)006:530: sdom pa gsum yar ldan gyi gang zag la zil gnon du log /
NK106(me)006:531: dgos pa yar ldan du rdzogs so //
NK106(me)006:532: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi ltung ba bskyed pa'i rnam
NK106(me)006:533: gzhag gi rgyu tshogs kyang sngags kyi dge slong thabs
NK106(me)006:534: khyadapara can la spyod dus ma tshang ste /
NK106(me)006:535: bdag nyid dge slong yul mi /
NK106(me)006:536: dngos zag byed la sogs dag /
NK106(me)006:538: rdo rje dang pad+mara shes pa la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:540: gsang ba shes rab dbang bskur ni //
NK106(me)006:541: tshangs par spyod pas blang mi bya //
NK106(me)006:542: zhes bshad pa dang 'gal lo snyam na /
NK106(me)006:543: de dag ni blo chung ba rnams la dgongs te /
NK106(me)006:544: dam pa dang po'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)006:545: drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta can lta bu blo
NK106(me)006:546: chung zhing don zab mo ring du spang bar 'gyur
NK106(me)006:547: ba rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:548: thog mar de skad brjod pas sngags la 'jug pa'i rgyur gsungs kyi /
NK106(me)006:549: rang bzhin du sngags kyi dge slong dbang bzhi ma rdzogs na sangs rgyas mi thob pas //
NK106(me)006:550: thams cad rdzogs par thob cing lam yang thabs grol gnyis la brten dgos pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:551: gsang ba shes rab tshangs spyod kyis mi blang zhes
NK106(me)006:552: pa yang blo chung ba dag grol du 'dzin pa'i
NK106(me)006:553: gang zag gis mi blang zhes dus dang por len
NK106(me)006:554: pa bkag / thams cad nas thams cad du ma yin no //
NK106(me)006:555: de yang sngon jo bo bod du byon du btsun
NK106(me)006:556: pa rnams spyod pa cung zad lhod pa dgag pa
NK106(me)006:557: la dgongs kyi / gnod pa'i tshad la dge slong
NK106(me)006:558: kho na sngags kyi rten mchog tu bshad pas shes
NK106(me)006:559: la dgongs kyi / so // gnad kyis mi 'gal ba ni /
NK106(me)006:560: gsum pa'i lam lta bu dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)006:561: lus sems zhu bde'i nyams kyis rgyas /
NK106(me)006:562: rang rgyud kyi chags pa dag /
NK106(me)006:564: bud med mthong yang chags pa mi skye na gsum pa'i lam bsgom yang /
NK106(me)006:565: so thar gyi sdom pa yar ldan du rdzogs te /
NK106(me)006:567: bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu //
NK106(me)006:568: 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang //
NK106(me)006:569: ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas kun //
NK106(me)006:570: ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /
NK106(me)006:573: mda' mkhan ma phyag rgyar bzhes pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)006:574: kha rtsang phan chad bram ze yin //
NK106(me)006:575: kha rtsang phan chad dge slong min //
NK106(me)006:576: di ring tshun chad dge slong yin //
NK106(me)006:577: he ru ka pa dge slong mchog /
NK106(me)006:579: de'i rjes la klu sgrub kyi mkhan po mdzad do //
NK106(me)006:580: gzhan yang chang dang phyi dro'i kha zas glu gar la sogs 'dod yon spyod pa rnams /
NK106(me)006:581: tshogs gnyis rdzogs shing sgrib gnyis spong ba'i thabs mchog tu gyur dus sngags su spyod la /
NK106(me)006:582: gzhan du 'dor bas don gcig ste /
NK106(me)006:583: sdom pa nyi shu pa las /
NK106(me)006:584: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
NK106(me)006:585: nyon mongs byang chub yan lag 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:587: sdom pa gsum gar skyon dang nyes pa bskyed pa rnams bkag cing sdom la /
NK106(me)006:588: yon tan bskyed pa rnams bkag pa gang na'ang med do //
NK106(me)006:589: yang kun rdzob smon 'jug gi sems bde ba chen
NK106(me)006:590: por snang ba thams cad shar dus byang chub sems
NK106(me)006:591: kyi sdom pa thams cad rdzogs te /
NK106(me)006:593: kun rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi //
NK106(me)006:594: byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya //
NK106(me)006:595: kun rdzob kun+da lta bu la //
NK106(me)006:596: don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no //
NK106(me)006:600: dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:601: zangs las gser gyi rnam pa ste //
NK106(me)006:602: zangs kyi dus na rdo med cing //
NK106(me)006:603: gser du gyur pas zangs mi snang //
NK106(me)006:604: rigs 'dzin nang gi dge slong la //
NK106(me)006:605: so sor thar dang byang chub sems //
NK106(me)006:606: gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni //
NK106(me)006:607: sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so //
NK106(me)006:608: zhes pas rigs 'dzin sngags kyi rang dus na so
NK106(me)006:609: thar dang byang sems zhes rdzas gzhan tha dad pa
NK106(me)006:610: med do // sngags kyi sdom pa rdzas su ngo bo gnas 'gyur du yod pa'i phyir la /
NK106(me)006:611: ldog pa ma 'dres par yod de /
NK106(me)006:612: thob la ma nyams pa de nyid /
NK106(me)006:613: so thar ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar khas blangs kyi /
NK106(me)006:614: sngags thob dus gtong rgyur ma bshad pa'i phyir dang /
NK106(me)006:615: byang sems snying po byang chub kyi bar du khas blangs kyi /
NK106(me)006:616: sngags thob dus nyams rkyen dang gtong rgyur ma gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:617: des na ngo bo sngags su rdzas gcig pas gzhan gnyis gnas 'gyur yin la /
NK106(me)006:618: ldog cha so sor ma 'dres te khas blangs pa'i
NK106(me)006:619: cha las nyams rkyen ma byung bar so sor gnas
NK106(me)006:620: pa'i phyir ro // de la so thar gyi gtong
NK106(me)006:621: rgyu slob pa phul ba la sogs pa mtshan nyid
NK106(me)006:622: pa gnyis dang gzhan bdun bshad la /
NK106(me)006:623: byang sems kyi mchod 'os bslu ba la sogs pa nag po'i chos bzhi bshad de /
NK106(me)006:624: shing rta chen por bshad pa bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:626: sngags su gzhan gnyis 'du ba ste //
NK106(me)006:627: bre gsum du do 'du ba bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:628: sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po las //
NK106(me)006:629: bla med mchog gi sdom pa ru //
NK106(me)006:630: 'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang //
NK106(me)006:631: byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa kun //
NK106(me)006:632: ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /
NK106(me)006:635: dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
NK106(me)006:636: de ni dge slong chen por gsungs //
NK106(me)006:637: de yis thams cad bya ba nyid //
NK106(me)006:639: dus skabs kyi gtso bor gang 'gyur ba ni /
NK106(me)006:640: gsang spyod kyi dus su sdom pa gsum gyi ltung
NK106(me)006:641: ba nang ma 'dzom pa rnams ni ma 'dres yongs
NK106(me)006:642: rdzogs su bsrung / 'og ma khyad du mi bsad /
NK106(me)006:643: 'doms na sngags gtso cher bsrung zhing dgag dgos yar ldan du 'gyur bar bya'o //
NK106(me)006:644: tshogs gseb tu'ang ma 'dzom na ma 'dres yongs rdzogs su bsrung /
NK106(me)006:645: 'doms na 'og ma gnyis gtso cher bsrungs pas sngags kyi dgongs pa shin tu gsang ba mthun zhing /
NK106(me)006:646: gzhan ma dad pa spangs pas dgos pa yar ldan du 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)006:647: 'di dag ni sdom pa gsum gyi rnam par gzhag pa ste /
NK106(me)006:648: gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor pa sdom pa sum ldan
NK106(me)006:649: rnams la shin tu gces pa'i mdzod du shes par
NK106(me)006:650: bya'o // de ltar sdom pa gsum gyis legs par bsdams pa'i gang zag /
NK106(me)006:651: las dang po yis gtso bor rang don bsgrub /
NK106(me)006:652: dben par sems bsrung rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi btang //
NK106(me)006:653: rkyen ngan spang zhing gnyen pos nyon mongs 'dul //
NK106(me)006:654: lta spyod ma 'dzol sgom pa lhur blangs shing //
NK106(me)006:655: dug lnga rang rgyud gang skyes skad cig la //
NK106(me)006:656: dran pas gzung zhing ma yengs gnyen po bsten //
NK106(me)006:657: sgo gsum bag yod shes shing ngo tsha shes //
NK106(me)006:658: khrel yod ldan pas rang rgyud gdul bar bya //
NK106(me)006:659: thar lam dang por zhugs pa dag gis dngos don gtso bor bsgrubs la /
NK106(me)006:660: rgyud dang yid kyis gzhan la phan pa bsam pa las /
NK106(me)006:662: rang gi rgyud nyon mongs pa'i phyir rkyen ngan pa dang /
NK106(me)006:664: nyon mongs la gnyen po bsten pa dang /
NK106(me)006:665: lta spyod ma 'dzol bas nyams su blang ba dang /
NK106(me)006:666: nyon mongs pa de gang skyes pa de dran pas bzung nas /
NK106(me)006:667: skad cig gnyis par rgyud la mi bzhag pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:668: lus ngag yid gsum dran shes bzhin bag yod gsum gyis shes par bya ba mchog tu gces te /
NK106(me)006:670: sems bsrung 'dod pa rnams la ni //
NK106(me)006:671: dran pa dang dang ni shes bzhin dag /
NK106(me)006:672: srog la bab kyang srungs shig ces //
NK106(me)006:673: bdag ni de skad thal mo sbyor //
NK106(me)006:675: khyad par blo rkyen khar 'chor bas rkyen snang dang rang snang gi chos la gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:676: bstod smad dgag sgrub snyan dang mi snyan la //
NK106(me)006:677: sgyu ma rmi lam bden med mgo snyoms bya //
NK106(me)006:678: brag ca'i sgra ltar rjes mthun bzod pa bsgom //
NK106(me)006:679: nga bdag 'dzin pa'i sems kyi rtsa ba bcad //
NK106(me)006:680: mdor na ci byed chos dang mi 'gal bas //
NK106(me)006:681: rang gi rgyud bsdams gzhan la mi gnod cing //
NK106(me)006:682: nyon mongs phyogs su skad cig ma song bar //
NK106(me)006:683: nyin mtshan dge bas 'da' ba shin tu gces //
NK106(me)006:684: bstod smad dang bde dogs ci byung dus phyi nang thams cad rmi lam sgyu mar shes pas /
NK106(me)006:685: yul med brag ca ltar bsam pa dang /
NK106(me)006:686: nang sems kyi khong khro dang zug rngu de nyid
NK106(me)006:687: ngo bo ngos gzung dbyibs dang kha dog gang du'ang
NK106(me)006:690: ye nas skye med ngang nyid las //
NK106(me)006:691: mi dgar ci yod dgar ci yod //
NK106(me)006:692: thob pa ci yod shor ci yod //
NK106(me)006:693: thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bar ni //
NK106(me)006:694: bdag 'dras yongs su shes par bgyi //
NK106(me)006:696: mdor na nyin mtshan thams cad du gang ci byed kyang rang rgyud 'ba' zhig 'dul bas /
NK106(me)006:697: gzhan la mi gnod nyon mongs pa rang zhi /
NK106(me)006:699: sangs rgyas bstan pa la bslab pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)006:701: nyid kyis thugs dul mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis //
NK106(me)006:702: sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba legs par gsungs //
NK106(me)006:705: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste //
NK106(me)006:706: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
NK106(me)006:707: rang gi sems ni yongs su dul //
NK106(me)006:708: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
NK106(me)006:710: da ni de dag gi 'thad pa 'god pa las /
NK106(me)006:711: dang po gzhan don bsgrub dka' ba'i phyir rang don ma shor ba la gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:712: ding sang dus ngan skye bo mi bsrun pas //
NK106(me)006:713: dben par rang don bsgrub pa shin tu gces //
NK106(me)006:714: 'dab gshog ma rdzogs 'phur bar mi nus ltar //
NK106(me)006:715: mngon shes mi ldan gzhan don mi nus pas //
NK106(me)006:716: rang don lhur blangs yid kyis gzhan phan bsam //
NK106(me)006:717: rnam g.yeng 'du 'dzi bdud kyi bslu brid 'dis //
NK106(me)006:718: rang sems ma bslus sgrub la 'bad pa gces //
NK106(me)006:719: 'chi dus 'gyod pas gdung bar ma byed cig /
NK106(me)006:720: ding sang ni sangs rgyas byon yang 'dul bar mi nus na /
NK106(me)006:721: bdag 'dra phan sems tsam yod kyang gdul bya dus la ni ma babs /
NK106(me)006:722: mngon shes rdzu 'phrul dang mi ldan /
NK106(me)006:723: stobs kyis 'god par mi nus pas /
NK106(me)006:724: gzhan don gyi gzugs brnyan mi nyan pa'i kha ta 'di zhog la /
NK106(me)006:725: dben pa'i nags 'dab bzang por sgrub pa rtse gcig tu byed pa la bskul te /
NK106(me)006:726: tshe 'di rnam g.yeng bdud kyi bslu brid 'dis sngar bslus pas des chog gi /
NK106(me)006:727: da snying nas dben par gcig pur 'gro dgos te /
NK106(me)006:728: 'chi ba'i dus su 'gyod pas mi gdung bar 'ong nges pas rang don bya ba la 'bad de /
NK106(me)006:729: gzhan don yid kyis bsam pa' dus lags so //
NK106(me)006:730: zhi ba lha'i zhal nas kyang /
NK106(me)006:731: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa //
NK106(me)006:732: rgyal bas kyang ni ma mgu na //
NK106(me)006:733: bdag 'dra ngan pas smos ci dgos //
NK106(me)006:735: rang don bsgrub par brtsams kyang brten so zin par
NK106(me)006:736: dka' ba'i phyir yang 'bad dgos par gdams pa ni
NK106(me)006:737: / de bas da lta sems la ser gdab ste //
NK106(me)006:738: da lta 'chi na 'khyer so ci 'dug ltos //
NK106(me)006:739: gar 'gro cir 'gyur brten so ma zin par //
NK106(me)006:740: rnam g.yeng 'khrul pas nyin mtshan 'da' ba 'di //
NK106(me)006:741: dal 'byor don med chud zos byed pas na //
NK106(me)006:742: gcig pur dben par snying po'i don bsgom zhing //
NK106(me)006:743: gtan gyi 'dun ma da res legs dgos so //
NK106(me)006:744: shi nas gar 'gro bdag la cha yod dam //
NK106(me)006:745: de bas di ring nyid du brtson par bya //
NK106(me)006:746: kha nang du ltos shig rang nyid da lta 'chi
NK106(me)006:747: na bde zhing skyid pa'i gnas 'dir 'gro zhe tshags
NK106(me)006:748: su tshud pa yod dam med /
NK106(me)006:749: nyin mtshan rnam g.yeng gis 'da' ba 'di dal 'byor chud zos su byed pa 'di soms la /
NK106(me)006:750: gtan gyi 'dun ma da res legs pa cig bya dgos pas dus 'di nyid /
NK106(me)006:751: 'dug sa 'di nyid nas snying nas chos la brtson dgos te /
NK106(me)006:754: mi lus kyang ni thob mi 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:755: mi lus thob par ma gyur na //
NK106(me)006:756: sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med //
NK106(me)006:758: 'khrul snang bzod dka' bas da res 'bad dgos par gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:760: 'di las thar thabs dgos so sems la zung //
NK106(me)006:761: da res 'khrul na gtan du 'khrul par 'khyam //
NK106(me)006:762: de bas brtson pa skyed cig snying la zhog /'khor
NK106(me)006:763: ba mtho dman gyi sdug bsngal bsam zhing skyi g.ya'
NK106(me)006:764: ba lam 'phrang 'jigs pa can nam g.yang sa chen
NK106(me)006:766: da res ma thar na gtan du thar dus med pa'i phyir 'bad dgos te /
NK106(me)006:768: g.yang sa tha mal chung ngu la'ang //
NK106(me)006:769: bag yod gnas par byed dgos na //
NK106(me)006:770: dpag tshad stong du lhung ba yi //
NK106(me)006:771: yun ring g.yang sar smos ci dgos //
NK106(me)006:773: srid mtsho brgal dka' bas da res 'bad dgos par gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:774: nyon mongs bdag 'dzin brgal bar dka' ba'i mtsho //
NK106(me)006:775: dal 'byor gru bos da res brgal bar bya //
NK106(me)006:776: thar lam byang chub brgya lam res 'ga' zhig /
NK106(me)006:777: bsod nams dbang gis snang ba'i gnas skabs 'dir //
NK106(me)006:778: snying nas brtson pas phan bde bsgrub par bya //
NK106(me)006:779: nyon mongs pa ni rgya mtsho'i bying dang 'dra ba la /
NK106(me)006:780: da res kyi dal 'byor gru dang 'dra bas sgrol dgos te /
NK106(me)006:782: gru 'di phyis nas rnyed dka' bas //
NK106(me)006:783: rmongs pa dus su gnyid ma log /
NK106(me)006:785: de'ang dal 'byor thob dka' ba thob /
NK106(me)006:787: chos bsgrub dgos snyam pa'i blo bring tsam cig skyes
NK106(me)006:788: pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje rang gi snying
NK106(me)006:789: la zhugs pas mun rum gyi glog dang 'dra zhing
NK106(me)006:790: / bsod nams kyi blo 'byung dka' ba sems la
NK106(me)006:791: byung ba'i dus 'di nas mgo bzung la 'bad dgos
NK106(me)006:793: dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka' //
NK106(me)006:794: skyes bu don grub thob par gyur pa la //
NK106(me)006:795: gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na //
NK106(me)006:796: phyis nas yang dag 'byor par ga la 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:797: ji ltar mtshan mo mun nag sprin rum na //
NK106(me)006:798: glog 'gyu skad cig bar snang ston pa ltar //
NK106(me)006:799: de bzhin sangs rgyas mthu yis brgya lam na //
NK106(me)006:800: 'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung //
NK106(me)006:801: de ltas dge ba nyam chung nyid la brtag /
NK106(me)006:803: 'gal rkyen 'byung nye bas chos la 'bad dgos par gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:804: tshe yang mi rtag skad cig 'gyur bar ste //
NK106(me)006:805: rnam g.yeng slu mkhas phyi bshol dge la byed //
NK106(me)006:806: 'khrul pa rgyun ring goms pa brtan pa na //
NK106(me)006:807: nyon mongs tshogs ni skad cig ngang gis 'byung //
NK106(me)006:808: bsod nams dge la 'bad kyang 'byung dka' bas //
NK106(me)006:809: las kyi rlung shugs bzlog la 'bad pa gces //
NK106(me)006:810: dus skad cig tsam mi rtag pa skyes bu'i tshe /
NK106(me)006:811: rnam g.yeng chos la bslu ba 'jig rten gyi snang ba /
NK106(me)006:812: phyi bshol dge ba la byed pa byis pa'i skye bo /
NK106(me)006:813: 'khrul snang yun ring la goms pa 'khor ba'i sems can /
NK106(me)006:814: nyon mongs char bzhin 'bab pa khams gsum gyi 'gro ba /
NK106(me)006:815: bsod nams brgya lam byed pa rgyal ba'i phrin las /
NK106(me)006:816: rba brgal bzlog par dka' ba nyon mongs kyi rgya mtsho ste /
NK106(me)006:817: dus res 'ag'i chos su ma song bar /
NK106(me)006:818: brtson pas chos la 'bad pa shin tu gces pa lags so //
NK106(me)006:819: ched du brjod pa'i tshoms las /
NK106(me)006:820: kye ma 'du byed rnam mi rtag /
NK106(me)006:823: de bas myur du zhi ba bde //
NK106(me)006:825: 'khor bar snying po med pas chos la 'bad dgos par gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:826: 'khor ba'i gnas na bde ba cung zad med //
NK106(me)006:827: srid pa'i sdug bsngal bsams na bzod glags med //
NK106(me)006:828: 'di las thar thabs da lan btsal bar bya //
NK106(me)006:829: snying nas snying po'i don la ma 'bad na //
NK106(me)006:830: dal khom res 'ag'i chos kyis phan mi thogs //
NK106(me)006:831: de bas mi rtag skyo shas cher bskyed de //
NK106(me)006:832: skad cig ma yengs sgrub la la brtson 'grus bskyed //
NK106(me)006:833: khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la bsams na /
NK106(me)006:835: 'di las da res thar pa'i thabs btsal ba la dal khom med par chos la brtson dgos so //
NK106(me)006:836: de'ang byas blo dang shes blos mi chog ste /
NK106(me)006:838: ji ltar mnyen pa mkhas pa zhig /
NK106(me)006:839: skye mabonga po sgrol byed kyang //
NK106(me)006:840: rang nyid de na 'chi ba ltar //
NK106(me)006:841: ma bsgoms chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK106(me)006:842: ji ltar 'on pa rol mo mkhan //
NK106(me)006:843: skye bo mang po mgu byed kyang //
NK106(me)006:844: rang nyid kyis ni ma thos ltar //
NK106(me)006:845: ma bsgoms chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK106(me)006:846: ji ltar skye bo skom pa dag /
NK106(me)006:847: chu ni mthong dang thos pa yis //
NK106(me)006:848: skom pa'i sdug bsngal mi sel ltar //
NK106(me)006:849: ma bsgoms chos kyang de dang 'dra //
NK106(me)006:851: da ni de thams cad kyi mjug bsdu ba ni /
NK106(me)006:852: de ltar dang po nyid du rtogs byas nas //
NK106(me)006:853: phyis nas 'phags pa'i go 'phang myur du 'thob //
NK106(me)006:854: rang don 'grub cing gzhan don ngang gis 'byung //
NK106(me)006:855: 'khor ba'i gnas las thar ba'i lam mchog rnyed //
NK106(me)006:856: de phyir ci byed chos dang bstun pa ni //
NK106(me)006:857: byang chub bsgrub pa'i rten gyi gang zag yin //
NK106(me)006:860: da res 'bad pas chos bsgrub dgos par gdams pa rnams legs par rtogs nas 'bad na /
NK106(me)006:863: gtan gyi 'dun ma legs pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:864: gang ci byed kyang chos dang mthun pa ni byang
NK106(me)006:865: chub bsgrub pa'i rten gyi gang zag tu mdo rgyud
NK106(me)006:866: thams cad las gsungs pa bdag gis de ltar bya
NK106(me)006:868: sdug bsngal me tshogs spungs pa'i 'khor ba 'dir //
NK106(me)006:869: bdag blo skyo bas zhi ba'i nags tshal du //
NK106(me)006:870: da res tshe 'dis bgrod par bya'o zhes //
NK106(me)006:871: snying nas brtson pas 'du 'dzi spang bar shog /
NK106(me)006:872: rang don dam pa bsgrub pa'i gnas skabs 'dir //
NK106(me)006:873: gzhan don ltar snang mngon par skyo ba can //
NK106(me)006:874: sna tshogs sdug bsngal mang ldan 'dis ci byed //
NK106(me)006:875: de bas gcig pur nags su gnas par shog /
NK106(me)006:876: da res 'bad kyang gzhan la ci zhig phan //
NK106(me)006:877: phyi nang gang na'ang bsam zhing skyo ba 'phel //
NK106(me)006:878: de bas gcig pur brag ri'i drung 'dug ste //
NK106(me)006:879: srog dang bcas pa'i lus 'dir 'dor bar shog /
NK106(me)006:880: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta rnam dag las /
NK106(me)006:881: ting 'dzin bsgom pa'i gang zag bstan pa ste rdo rje'i gnas gnyis pa'o ////
NK106(me)006:882: da ni gang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos bstan pa las /
NK106(me)006:883: re zhig mdor bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:884: gsum pa nyams su blang bya'i chos la gsum /
NK106(me)006:885: sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes kyi rim pa'o //
NK106(me)006:888: mjug gi rim pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)006:889: re re zhing rgyas par dbye ba'i /
NK106(me)006:890: dang po sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bstan pa /
NK106(me)006:891: mi rtag skyo shas phyi yi sngon 'gro ste //
NK106(me)006:892: tshe 'di'i zhen pa gting nas zlog par byed //
NK106(me)006:893: snying rje sems bskyed bye brag sngon 'gro ste //
NK106(me)006:894: theg chen lam du chos rnams 'gro bar byed //
NK106(me)006:895: de phyir thog mar sngon 'gro rnam gnyis sbyong /
NK106(me)006:896: theg pa chen po'i lam ji ltar bsgom yang de'i sngon du /
NK106(me)006:897: tshe mi rtag pa bsam pa dang /
NK106(me)006:898: 'khor ba sdug bsngal du bsam pa dang /
NK106(me)006:899: de la snying rje bsgom pa dang /
NK106(me)006:900: de'i ched du rang nyid sangs rgyas thob par sems pa'i byang chub sems bsgom pa gces so //
NK106(me)006:901: tshe mi rtag par shes pas sgrub pa long yod la mi 'chor ba dang /
NK106(me)006:902: 'khor ba sdug bsngal du shes pas tshe 'di las blo ldog pa dang /
NK106(me)006:903: snying rje phyogs med du bsgoms pas theg pa dman par mi ltung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:904: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas myur du sangs rgyas thob pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK106(me)006:905: de la thabs snying rje chen po dang shes rab
NK106(me)006:906: mtha' gnyis las mi gnas pa ni theg pa chen
NK106(me)006:907: po'i khyad par gyi chos te /
NK106(me)006:909: thabs med shes rab bral bas nyan thos nyid du ltung //
NK106(me)006:912: stong nyid snyi nga rje'i snying po can //
NK106(me)006:913: byang chub sgrub pa kha cig la'o //
NK106(me)006:916: shes pas srid la mi gnas shing //
NK106(me)006:917: snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang //
NK106(me)006:918: thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang //
NK106(me)006:919: thabs kyi ring ba ma yin nyid //
NK106(me)006:922: snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang //
NK106(me)006:923: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no //
NK106(me)006:924: 'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang //
NK106(me)006:925: srid pa 'dir gnas thar pa thob mi 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:926: gang dag gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa de //
NK106(me)006:927: srid par mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas //
NK106(me)006:929: de nas mchog gi sngon 'gro bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:930: de rjes khyad par mchog gi sngon 'gro ni //
NK106(me)006:931: dbang rdzogs thob nas bskyed pa'i rim gnyis te //
NK106(me)006:932: rang lus lha dang snod bcud lhag gsal bas //
NK106(me)006:933: tha mal 'dzin pa'i zhen pa zlog par byed //
NK106(me)006:934: lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis //
NK106(me)006:935: byin rlabs tshad med thugs rje shugs las 'char //
NK106(me)006:936: bar chad kun sel dngos grub rnam gnyis thob //
NK106(me)006:937: de phyir de rjes sngon 'gro rnam gnyis bsgom //
NK106(me)006:938: dbang legs par thob nas bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa la
NK106(me)006:939: dang por zhugs pa ni tshogs lam chung ngur tshud
NK106(me)006:940: nas thar pa'i lam sna zin par 'dod pas /
NK106(me)006:941: lam gyi gzhi dbang yin la /
NK106(me)006:942: de thob nas sngags thun mong du lam dngos bskyed
NK106(me)006:943: rdzogs spel ma stan thog gcig tu bsgom par grags
NK106(me)006:944: kyang / 'dir rdzogs pa chen pazho'i rnam gag gis /
NK106(me)006:947: rtsa thig rlung gsum phra mo'i rnal 'byor dang bcas
NK106(me)006:948: pa thams cad rdzogs pa chung ngu dmigs bcas su
NK106(me)006:949: bsdus nas lam gyi sngon 'gror bstan pas de dag
NK106(me)006:950: gi rnam gzhag cung zad bshad na /
NK106(me)006:951: smin byed dbang dang grol byed bskyed rdzogs gnyis te /
NK106(me)006:952: snang ba rdo rje 'char ba'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)006:953: gang phyir rdo rje 'chang chen gyis //
NK106(me)006:954: gsungs pa'i don ni rnam mang po //
NK106(me)006:955: mdor bsdus rnam pa gnyis yin te //
NK106(me)006:956: smin pa dang ni grol ba'o //
NK106(me)006:960: sgra don bshad pa dang gsum las /
NK106(me)006:962: dag bya nyon mongs pa bzhi dang /
NK106(me)006:963: sgrub byed phyag rgya bzhi dang /
NK106(me)006:965: 'bras bu sku bzhi la sogs brtson par byed pa la dbang bzhir grags so //
NK106(me)006:966: go rims nges pa la lta ba dang sbyar ba dang /
NK106(me)006:967: rten dang brten pa dag tshul dang sbyar ba gnyis las /
NK106(me)006:968: dang po ni bum dbang gis snang sems sgyu ma
NK106(me)006:969: lta bu'i skur gnas pas sems tsam gyi lta ba
NK106(me)006:970: rtogs / gsang dbang gis chos thams cad spros bral
NK106(me)006:971: rab tu mi gnas par bstan pas dbu ma'i lta
NK106(me)006:972: rtogs / ba rtogs / sheb rab ye shes dbang
NK106(me)006:973: gis bde stong dbyer med du bstan pas gsang sngags
NK106(me)006:974: nang pa gnyis kyi lta ba rtogs /
NK106(me)006:975: tshig dbang gis blo 'das rig pa byang chub kyi
NK106(me)006:976: sems su bstan pas rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba
NK106(me)006:977: rtogs so // gnyis pa rten dang brten pa dag tshul dang sbyar na /
NK106(me)006:978: lus sems tshogs pa gcig gis rten dang brten pa byin gyis rlob cing 'dag par byed de /
NK106(me)006:980: de la rlung dang thig le /
NK106(me)006:981: de la rig pa byang chub kyi sems brtan pas /
NK106(me)006:982: lus dag cing smin par byed pa la bum dbang /
NK106(me)006:983: rtsa dag cing smin par byed pa la gsang dbang /
NK106(me)006:984: thig le dag cing smin par byed pa la shes rab ye shes kyi dbang /
NK106(me)006:985: rig pa byang chub kyi sems dag cing smin par byed pa la tshig dbang rin po che'o //
NK106(me)006:986: sgra don ni a b+hi shiny+tsa dang she ka ta
NK106(me)006:987: ste dri ma 'khrud cing skal pa 'jog pa'i phyir
NK106(me)006:988: dbang ngo // de yang tshe 'dir sa rab tu
NK106(me)006:989: dga' ba'i bden mthong la sbyor bar dbang bas kyang
NK106(me)006:992: dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu //
NK106(me)006:993: cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te //
NK106(me)006:994: gsang ba thar pas yang dag 'byung //
NK106(me)006:995: skye ba 'di nyid kho na la //
NK106(me)006:996: rab dga' sgrub par byed pa yin //
NK106(me)006:998: dbang ma thob pa'i nyes pa ni //
NK106(me)006:1000: slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing //
NK106(me)006:1001: dbang rnams thob par ma byas par //
NK106(me)006:1002: nyam pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams //
NK106(me)006:1008: mkha' la khu tshur gyis brdeg ngang //
NK106(me)006:1009: rmongs pa phub ma brdungs dang mtshungs //
NK106(me)006:1011: dbang thob pa'i phan yon ni /
NK106(me)006:1013: dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na //
NK106(me)006:1014: ma 'bad par yang dngos grub thob //
NK106(me)006:1017: grol byed lam gyi rim pa ni //
NK106(me)006:1020: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa //
NK106(me)006:1021: rim pa gnyis la yang dag bstan //
NK106(me)006:1022: bskyed pa'i rim pa dang po ste //
NK106(me)006:1023: rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1026: kun rdzob lha'i snang ba la brten nas tha mal
NK106(me)006:1027: gyi rtog pa spang zhing phung po khams dang skye
NK106(me)006:1028: mched kyi tshogs bdun pa'i chos dag par sbyangs la
NK106(me)006:1029: / rdzogs rim ni phra mo'am bsam gyis mi khyab
NK106(me)006:1030: don dam pa'i dbyings dang mthun pa la brten nas
NK106(me)006:1031: nang sems kyi spros pa nye bar zhi ba'i rang
NK106(me)006:1033: zung du 'brel ba ni dngos grub kyi lam du bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1035: phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor bas //
NK106(me)006:1036: rdo rje'i sku ni bsgrub par bya //
NK106(me)006:1037: rin chen bzlas pa'i bzlas pa las //
NK106(me)006:1038: dri med rdo rje'i gsung du 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:1039: bsam gtan rdo rje rab bsams na //
NK106(me)006:1040: rin chen sems su rab tu 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1043: thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste //
NK106(me)006:1044: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor nga rgyal gyis //
NK106(me)006:1045: sangs rgyas nyid yun ring mi 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:1047: de la bskyed pa med par rdzogs par mi rung ste /
NK106(me)006:1049: lha dang bral ba'i lam de ni //
NK106(me)006:1050: log pa'i lam du byung ba ste //
NK106(me)006:1051: sngags kyi lam du de mi rung //
NK106(me)006:1053: de la gdod ma nas sku gsung thugs rdo rjer
NK106(me)006:1054: gnas kyang bag chags kyi sgrib pas mi gsal ba
NK106(me)006:1055: nyid / gsal bar byed pa la rim gnyis kyi 'khor lo bsgom pa yin te /
NK106(me)006:1057: lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
NK106(me)006:1058: bskyed pa tsam gyis rnal 'byor gnas //
NK106(me)006:1059: gzhan la kha dog gnas pa ni //
NK106(me)006:1060: 'on kyang bag chags phal bas sangs //
NK106(me)006:1062: de ltar bsgoms pa'i yon tan ni /
NK106(me)006:1064: sangs rgyas de nyid gang bsgoms pa //
NK106(me)006:1065: byang chub ma thob na yang skye //
NK106(me)006:1066: skye zhing skye ba rnams su de //
NK106(me)006:1068: yang na sa bdag nyid du'am //
NK106(me)006:1069: dag pa'i gnas su nges par 'gro //
NK106(me)006:1071: de ltar go don spyir bzhag nas /
NK106(me)006:1072: thun mgor ji ltar bsgom pa'i rim pa ni rigs kyi dkyil 'khor zhi khro gang rung ngam /
NK106(me)006:1073: rigs thams cad kyi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'
NK106(me)006:1074: yab yum du bsgoms la yi ge brgya pa bzlas
NK106(me)006:1075: te / rgyal ba gcig bsgoms sangs rgyas kun gyi ngang //
NK106(me)006:1078: sangs rgyas thams cad rigs lnga'i dbye bsdu las ma 'das shing /
NK106(me)006:1079: de yang zhi khro gnyis las ma 'das par ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir te /
NK106(me)006:1081: lha rnams thams cad zhi ba'am //
NK106(me)006:1082: yang na khro bor bsgom par bya //
NK106(me)006:1083: sangs rgyas gar mkhan bsam mi khyab //
NK106(me)006:1084: bdag gis brjod par ga la nus //
NK106(me)006:1085: thams cad sems kyi rnam 'phrul las //
NK106(me)006:1086: stong pa'i rdo rje can zhig ni //
NK106(me)006:1087: rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:1089: de'ang phreng ba de gang bsgom pa'i yi dam du bskyed la ye shes pa bstim /
NK106(me)006:1091: rten 'brel snying pos me tog gtor /
NK106(me)006:1092: yab yum 'od du zhu nas mdo 'dzin la thim pa +aahmh'u du gyur /
NK106(me)006:1093: phreng rdog gzhan rnams +aa li k+aa lir gsal btab la /
NK106(me)006:1094: sngags bzlas dus yi ge de dag lha dang sngags kyi rang sgra 'phro bar byed par bsams la /
NK106(me)006:1095: mis mi mthong bar 'phreng ba khung du bcang ngo //
NK106(me)006:1096: sngags kyang la la ming nas 'bod pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1097: la la gnad nas bskul ba /
NK106(me)006:1098: la la yon tan brjod pa yin te /
NK106(me)006:1100: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK106(me)006:1101: mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo dag /
NK106(me)006:1102: mngon par phyogs par bya phyir te //
NK106(me)006:1103: dper na skyes chen 'ga' zhig la //
NK106(me)006:1104: che la myur ba'i sgras 'bod na //
NK106(me)006:1105: thos pa tsam gyis 'ong ba ltar //
NK106(me)006:1106: sangs rgyas skad cig de la 'byon //
NK106(me)006:1108: sngags shin tu dag dgos te /
NK106(me)006:1109: rgyud sde kun nas sngags bsdu ba gsungs pa'i don yin no //
NK106(me)006:1110: de'ang ma dag pa stong bzlas pa bas dag pa gcig 'gyur che la /
NK106(me)006:1111: dmigs pas ma zin pa'am dmigs pa yengs pas 'bum bzlas pa bas /
NK106(me)006:1112: ma yengs pa gcig 'gyur che ste /
NK106(me)006:1114: dag dang ma dag stong 'gyur la //
NK106(me)006:1118: bzlas brjod dang ni dka' thub kun //
NK106(me)006:1119: yun ring dus su spyad byas kyang //
NK106(me)006:1120: sems gzhan g.yeng bas zin pa ni //
NK106(me)006:1121: de nyid rig pas don med gsungs //
NK106(me)006:1123: de ltar yi dam lhar bskyed nas sngags cung zad bzlas nas /
NK106(me)006:1124: spyi bor rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma la sangs
NK106(me)006:1125: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo mkha' 'gros
NK106(me)006:1130: gang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba 'debs par byas te /
NK106(me)006:1131: lam thams cad kyi rtsa ba dngos grub thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:1133: sa dang lam gyi rim pa rnams //
NK106(me)006:1134: bla ma'i mos gus lo bzlas bgrod //
NK106(me)006:1135: bla ma'i snang ba ma bral na //
NK106(me)006:1136: sangs rgyas rnams dang 'bral med gnas //
NK106(me)006:1139: g.yo med mos gus zla drug gis //
NK106(me)006:1143: spyi gtsug 'khor lo'i rgyan nyid du //
NK106(me)006:1144: dpal ldan bla ma bsam par bya //
NK106(me)006:1146: des ni bar chod med cing rtogs pa rang shugs kyis 'char /
NK106(me)006:1147: sa lam ngang gis bgrod pa'i dgos pa yod do //
NK106(me)006:1148: sngon 'gro sbyangs pa'i phan yon bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1149: de ltar sngon du 'gro ba'i chos bzhi yis //
NK106(me)006:1150: ma nor lam du sems nyid tshud pa dang //
NK106(me)006:1151: thar lam mchog zin gnas lugs myur du skye //
NK106(me)006:1152: dngos gzhi 'byongs sla bar chad med pa dang //
NK106(me)006:1153: dngos grub nye sogs yon tan tshad med ldan //
NK106(me)006:1154: de phyir sngon 'gro sbyang ba shin tu gces //
NK106(me)006:1155: rdzogs rim chen po rig pa byang chub kyi sems
NK106(me)006:1156: ma bcos rnal du 'jog pa'i sngon du mi rtag
NK106(me)006:1157: pa dang / snying rje byang chub kyi sems dang /
NK106(me)006:1158: snang srid sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang lhar bskyed nas /
NK106(me)006:1159: sngags bzlas shing phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sems bzung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1160: bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsgoms la gsol ba gdab pa
NK106(me)006:1161: rnams te bzhi po sngon du mi 'gro ba med
NK106(me)006:1162: do // de ltar song ba las thar lam ma nor tshud pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1163: gnas lugs kyi don skye ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1164: dngos gzhi sbyong bar sla ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1166: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub myur du thob
NK106(me)006:1167: pa la sogs pa'i phan yon mtha' yas pa gzhan
NK106(me)006:1168: yang 'grub bo // ding sang ni gang yang sngon
NK106(me)006:1169: du ma song bar lam bsgom pa mang ste 'chugs
NK106(me)006:1170: yang 'grub bo // pa zhes bya'o // da ni lam dngos bstan pa las /
NK106(me)006:1171: dang po mdor bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1172: dngos gzhi rig pa'ang bde gsal mi rtog pa'i //
NK106(me)006:1173: bsam gtan thabs las gnas lugs ngo sprad de //
NK106(me)006:1174: 'od gsal spros dang bral ba'i ye shes ni //
NK106(me)006:1175: gnyug ma lhan cig skyes pa 'char ba yin //
NK106(me)006:1176: bud shing de me ma yin yang thab de las me 'bar ba mthong du rung ba ltar /
NK106(me)006:1177: bde gsal mi rtog pa gsum po de rig pa
NK106(me)006:1178: rang byung gi ye shes gnyug ma lhan cig skyes
NK106(me)006:1180: thabs brtson par bya ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:1184: bla ma'i man ngag dang mos gus yod pa rnams kyis rig par bya ste ye shes de ni /
NK106(me)006:1186: zab zhi spros bral 'od gsal 'dus ma byas //
NK106(me)006:1187: bdud rtsi lta bu'i chos 'di bdag gis rnyed //
NK106(me)006:1188: su la bstan kyang go bar mi 'gyur bas //
NK106(me)006:1189: mi smra gcig pur nags su gnas par bya //
NK106(me)006:1191: rang bzhin rgyas par bshad pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)006:1192: bde stong lhan cig skyes pa'i thabs bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1193: dang po bde chen thabs la ngo sprad pa //
NK106(me)006:1194: de yang sngon 'gro sngar bzhin bsgoms pa'i rjes //
NK106(me)006:1195: 'khor lo bzhi dbus rtsa gsum ka ba'i tshul //
NK106(me)006:1196: g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing sbubs ma can //
NK106(me)006:1197: yar sna tshangs phug mar sna gsang gnas te //
NK106(me)006:1198: lte ba'i thad drang dbu ma'i nang a las //
NK106(me)006:1199: me 'bar spyi bo'i ham las bdud rtsi bab //
NK106(me)006:1200: 'khor lo bzhi dang lus nang kun gang ste //
NK106(me)006:1201: bde bas khyab dus snying gar bam yig las //
NK106(me)006:1202: ham gi bdud rtsi rgyun chad med par 'bab //
NK106(me)006:1203: bde ba'i nyams ma skyes kyi bar du bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1204: de nas bam yang je chung je phra la //
NK106(me)006:1205: dmigs gsum spros dang bral ba'i ngang du bzhag /
NK106(me)006:1206: thabs des sems zin bde bas zhi gnas skye //
NK106(me)006:1207: 'dir slob dpon sh+r+ai sing+hasa slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas la gdams pa /
NK106(me)006:1208: bde gsal rnam par mi rtog pa bsam gyis mi
NK106(me)006:1209: khyab pa'i snyan brgyud ji lta ba bzhin bstan pa
NK106(me)006:1210: las / dang po thabs kyi bde ba dam pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1211: snang srid lha dang bla ma'i rnal 'byor du bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)006:1212: spyi bo bde chen gyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab sum cu rtsa gnyis /
NK106(me)006:1213: mgrin pa longs spyod kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab bcu drug /
NK106(me)006:1214: snying ga chos kyi 'khor lo rtsa 'dab brgyad /
NK106(me)006:1215: lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo rtsa 'dab drug cu
NK106(me)006:1216: rtsa bzhir gsal ba'i dbus ka ba'i tshul du g.yas
NK106(me)006:1220: yar sna spyi gtsug mar sna gsang gnas su sleb pa las /
NK106(me)006:1221: khyad par du dbu ma de je che la /
NK106(me)006:1225: mthar lus thams cad dbu ma'i rang bzhin du srab sang sang song ba'i nang du sems gtad pas /
NK106(me)006:1226: rtsa gnas gang du sems zin yang dbu ma'i yon tan 'ba' zhig 'char ba'i gnad do //
NK106(me)006:1227: de ltar dbu ma'i nang lte ba'i thad drang du
NK106(me)006:1228: a shad me'i rnam pa skra rtse tsam las me
NK106(me)006:1230: spyi bo'i ham sran ma tsam la reg pas bdud rtsi dkar dmar gyi rgyun babs te /
NK106(me)006:1231: 'khor lo bzhi dang lus thams cad gang zhing /
NK106(me)006:1232: khyad par du snying ga na bam sngo skya la bab pas bde ba bskyed par bsams la /
NK106(me)006:1233: sems ma yengs par bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)006:1234: bde phril ba byung dus bam de je chung je
NK106(me)006:1235: phra las mthar yal nas ci yang med pa'i ngang
NK106(me)006:1236: la sems mnyam par gzhag go //
NK106(me)006:1237: thabs des bde stong spros pa dang bral ba'i ye
NK106(me)006:1238: shes rang la yod pa de dus der 'char ba'i
NK106(me)006:1239: gnad do // bde stong gi 'od gsal shar ba de rang ngo sprad pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1240: de nas gang yang bsam brjod 'das pa'i sems //
NK106(me)006:1241: blo bral nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngang nyid 'char //
NK106(me)006:1242: de ni 'od gsal bde stong rdzogs pa che //
NK106(me)006:1243: rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab chos nyid yin //
NK106(me)006:1244: bde ba'i thabs la ci yang mi dmigs par bsgom pa na /
NK106(me)006:1245: de dang rjes su mthun pa lus sems bde la
NK106(me)006:1246: sems spro bsdu dang bral ba'i rig pa rang dngas
NK106(me)006:1247: har sang nam mkha' 'dra ba zang thal shar ba
NK106(me)006:1248: ni bde ba 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po rang
NK106(me)006:1249: byung gi ye shes rang ngo 'phrod pa yin no
NK106(me)006:1251: bde chen rdo rje bsam mi khyab //
NK106(me)006:1252: 'od gsal nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:1254: de ltar bsgoms pa'i nyams kyi rim pa bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1255: de nyid bsgoms las nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)006:1256: gang snang thams cad bde bar 'char ba dang //
NK106(me)006:1257: nyin mtshan bde ba'i ngang nas 'bral mi phod //
NK106(me)006:1258: chags sdang la sogs zug rngus rgyud mi 'khrugs //
NK106(me)006:1259: chos kyi tshig don sbyor ba'i shes rab skye //
NK106(me)006:1260: khams dngas ma rgyas pa'i nyams las snang ba 'char ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1261: nyin mtshan bde bas 'da' ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1262: zug rngus sems mi 'khrugs pa gsum 'char bas /
NK106(me)006:1263: rig pa rang ngo mthong ba'i nyams las shes rab khyad par can dang /
NK106(me)006:1264: thugs rjes brtan pa 'char ba yin no //
NK106(me)006:1266: de nas yang bsgom spyan dang mngon shes sogs //
NK106(me)006:1267: yon tan dpag med nyi ma sems la 'char //
NK106(me)006:1268: 'di ni yang zab gnad kyi gdams pa yin //
NK106(me)006:1269: bde stong bsam gyis mi khyab bsgoms pa las sngar
NK106(me)006:1270: bas lhag pa'i brtan pa thob pas spyan dang mngon
NK106(me)006:1271: par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa'i yon
NK106(me)006:1272: tan 'char ro // de nas gsal stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes brtan pa las /
NK106(me)006:1273: thabs kyi rim pa ji ltar bsgom pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1274: gnyis pa gsal ba'i thabs kyi ngo sprad pa //
NK106(me)006:1275: sngon 'gro sngar bzhin rtsa gsum gsal btab pa'i //
NK106(me)006:1276: ro rkyang gug nas dbu mar 'jug pa'i tshul //
NK106(me)006:1277: mar snar bsgoms la yar sna sna bug gtad //
NK106(me)006:1278: rlung ro gsum bus nad gdon sdig sgrib song //
NK106(me)006:1279: dal bus gsum rngub brtan g.yo'i 'jig rten kun //
NK106(me)006:1280: 'od zhu sna nas tshur byung ro rkyang nas //
NK106(me)006:1281: dbu ma'i nang byung snying dbus tshon gang 'od //
NK106(me)006:1282: gong bu la thim thub thang bar du bzung //
NK106(me)006:1283: steng 'og kha sbyar gtong dus cung zad bzung //
NK106(me)006:1284: dal bus 'byung rngub bya ba shin tu gces //
NK106(me)006:1285: gzhan yang sangs rgyas la sogs yon tan kun //
NK106(me)006:1286: snying gar thim las gzhan du ma yengs bya //
NK106(me)006:1287: thabs des sems gsal dngas la gnas pa 'byung //
NK106(me)006:1288: rtsa bsgom pa'i bar sngar dang 'dra ba'i ro rkyang gnyis kyi mar sna dbu mar tshud /
NK106(me)006:1289: yar sna sna bug gnyis nas phar rlung ro bus pas nad gdon phyir song /
NK106(me)006:1290: dal bus rngubs pas 'jig rten gsum po sangs rgyas
NK106(me)006:1291: la sogs pa'i yon tan thams cad 'od kha dog
NK106(me)006:1292: lngar gyur pa sna bug nas lam byung /
NK106(me)006:1293: mar sna nas yar zhugs pas rlung snying gar thim pas /
NK106(me)006:1294: dbu ma ye shes lnga'i rlung gis gang ba la
NK106(me)006:1295: sems bzung bas gsal stong mi rtog pa'i 'od gsal
NK106(me)006:1296: 'char ro // 'di ni mchog tu zab mo ste /
NK106(me)006:1298: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i byin rlabs myur du zhugs pas /
NK106(me)006:1299: shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin sngon med pa 'char ba'o //
NK106(me)006:1300: de nas 'od gsal rnam sbyong gi dmigs pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1301: de rjes snying ga'i 'od las 'od mched de //
NK106(me)006:1302: lus nang 'khor lo bzhi nas 'bar ba las //
NK106(me)006:1303: phyir mched 'od kyis 'jig rten khyab par bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1304: zhag 'gar nyin mtshan de nyid don bsgoms pas //
NK106(me)006:1305: rmi lam 'gag dang 'od kyi snang ba ni //
NK106(me)006:1306: zla ba 'bar ba me khyer skar la sogs //
NK106(me)006:1307: 'od lnga'i snang bas phyi nang khyab par mthong //
NK106(me)006:1308: gsal ba'i ngang du sems zin zhi gnas skye //
NK106(me)006:1309: dbu ma'i nang du ye shes kyi 'od bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)006:1310: 'khor lo bzhi dang lus nang thams cad khyab pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1311: de nas phyir mched de 'jig rten gyi khams nam
NK106(me)006:1312: mkhas gar khyab ye shes kyi 'od lngas khyab pa
NK106(me)006:1313: la sems bzung la rlung kha sbyor du gzung zhing
NK106(me)006:1314: / phyir gtong dus rlung zhabs cung zad bzung la /
NK106(me)006:1315: dal bus rngub ste bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)006:1316: dbu mar ye shes lnga'i rlung zin pa'i rtags su
NK106(me)006:1317: bsgom khang nye 'khor du 'od lnga'i snang ba dang
NK106(me)006:1318: / sgron me 'bar ba lta bud nga /
NK106(me)006:1319: zla ba shar ba lta bu dang /
NK106(me)006:1320: srin bu me khyer lta bu dang /
NK106(me)006:1325: lha'i gzugs brnyan lta bu la sogs pa'i snang ba dpag tu med pa 'char ro //
NK106(me)006:1326: 'di'i dus su sems rtse gcig tu gnas pa'i zhi gnas dang /
NK106(me)006:1327: rang gsal rjen pa'i lhag mthong gnyis ngo bo gcig tu 'char ro //
NK106(me)006:1328: snang ba rnam dag gi bsam gtan ni /
NK106(me)006:1329: de nas slar bsdu snying ga'i 'od zer yang //
NK106(me)006:1330: je chung je phra stong nyid ngang bzhag pas //
NK106(me)006:1331: gang du'ang mi dmigs stong gsal dngas pa'i sems //
NK106(me)006:1332: rang bzhin spros dang bral ba'i 'od gsal 'char //
NK106(me)006:1333: 'od kyi snang ba thams cad 'khor lo bzhi nas snying gar bsdu /
NK106(me)006:1334: de yang je phra las nam mkha' ltar ci yang ma grub pa'i ngang la bzhag pas /
NK106(me)006:1335: rig pa zang ka rgya phyam gsal dngas par shar
NK106(me)006:1336: ba ni gsal stong rang byung gi ye shes so
NK106(me)006:1337: // don de ngo sprad pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1338: de ni gsal stong gnyug ma'i ye shes te //
NK106(me)006:1339: rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs yin //
NK106(me)006:1340: dngas gsal zang ka'i ngo bo de ni stong gsal rdzogs pa chen po'i gnas lugs te /
NK106(me)006:1342: yid la mi byed mtshan ma'i rjes mi 'breng //
NK106(me)006:1343: 'di ni rang byung 'od gsal dgongs pa ste //
NK106(me)006:1345: de ltar bsgoms pa'i nyams ni /
NK106(me)006:1346: de nyid goms pas nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)006:1347: gang snang 'al 'ol zang thal gsal ba snyam //
NK106(me)006:1348: nyin mtshan gsal ba'i ngang la gnas pa dang //
NK106(me)006:1349: rnam rtog mi g.yo sems gsal dngas pa dang //
NK106(me)006:1350: shes rab klong rdol gzung 'dzin bral ba'o //
NK106(me)006:1351: de la rlung gi nyams su snang ba 'al 'ol zang thal ba snyam pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1352: nyin mtshan gsal dngas phyed pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1353: rtog pa 'gags la shes pa dngas pa gsum 'char la /
NK106(me)006:1354: rig pa rang ngo shes pa'i ngang bskyangs pa'i nyams
NK106(me)006:1355: las gzung 'dzin med cing blo myur la shes rab
NK106(me)006:1358: de yang goms las yon tan 'char ba dang //
NK106(me)006:1359: sgrib pas chod kyang pha rol zang thal sogs //
NK106(me)006:1360: mthong ba'i spyan dang rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:1361: 'di ni yang zab gdams pa'i nying khu yin //
NK106(me)006:1362: rlung gi rnal 'byor goms pas ting nge 'dzin skye zhing /
NK106(me)006:1363: de'i mthus mngon shes 'char ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1364: rtsig pa la sogs pas bar du chod kyang de'i
NK106(me)006:1365: pha rol zang thal du mthong ba la sogs pa'i
NK106(me)006:1368: bsam gtan gyis ni 'dod pa'i yon tan smad pa 'dor //
NK106(me)006:1369: rig dang mngon par shes dang ting 'dzin mngon par 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1371: de nas rig stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bstan pa las /
NK106(me)006:1372: thabs kyi rim pa bshad de /
NK106(me)006:1373: spyir rtsa dbu ma'i nang je cher song ba la
NK106(me)006:1374: sems gtad pas mi rtog pa 'grub pa ni gzhan
NK106(me)006:1375: dang mtshungs la / khyad par du 'phang gzung sbyang
NK106(me)006:1376: gsum gyis rig pa'i gnad la bsger bas rnam par
NK106(me)006:1377: mi rtog pa btsan thabs su ngo sprad par bya
NK106(me)006:1378: dang mtshungs la / ba ni / gsum pa mi rtog thabs kyis ngo sprad pa //
NK106(me)006:1379: sngon 'gro sngar bzhin dngos gzhi rnam pa gsum //
NK106(me)006:1380: 'phang ba gzung ba sbyang ba'i rim pa las //
NK106(me)006:1381: 'phang ba snying gar sems nyid 'od gsal ba //
NK106(me)006:1382: aa'am 'od kyi gong bu tshon gang zhig /
NK106(me)006:1383: ha zhes nyer gcig ngar dang bcas brjod pas //
NK106(me)006:1384: rgyangs kyis spyi gtsug nas 'thon mkha' la song //
NK106(me)006:1385: je mtho je mthor mthar ni bltar med pa'i //
NK106(me)006:1386: ngang du lus sems khong glod mnyam par gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1387: skad cig de la rnam rtog rgyun chad de //
NK106(me)006:1388: smra bsam brjod du med pa'i ngang du gnas //
NK106(me)006:1389: nyams kyang bltar med bsam yul 'das pa 'byung //
NK106(me)006:1390: de la dbu ma'i stong ra yan chad sngar bzhin
NK106(me)006:1391: bsgoms pa'i snying ga nas 'od lnga'i gong bu ya
NK106(me)006:1392: mtshan pa spyi gtsug las 'thon nas je mtho je
NK106(me)006:1394: mthar bltar med par sa nga /
NK106(me)006:1395: ha drag po nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod nas lus sems glod pas /
NK106(me)006:1396: skad cig de la smra bsam brjod du med pa'i 'od gsal 'char ro //
NK106(me)006:1397: nyams kyang bsam du med pa nam mkha' la bur myang ba'o //
NK106(me)006:1399: gzung ba nyi ma'i ngos la rgyab gtad de //
NK106(me)006:1400: dngas pa'i mkha' la mig gtad lhan ner bzhag /
NK106(me)006:1401: rlung rgyu mi tshor ci nas dal bar bya //
NK106(me)006:1402: mi rtog spros dang bral ba khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)006:1403: rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu'i stong nyams skye //
NK106(me)006:1404: nam mkha' rab tu dngas pa'i tshe nyi ma la
NK106(me)006:1405: rgyab bstan nas mig mi 'gul bar nam mkha'i dkyil
NK106(me)006:1406: la gtad cing rlung dal bas phyir gzung ba'i skad
NK106(me)006:1407: cig la stong pa'i 'od gsal 'char ro //
NK106(me)006:1409: rgya chad dang phyogs lhung med pa nam mkha' lta bu 'byung ste /
NK106(me)006:1410: ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang //
NK106(me)006:1411: zhes pa'i rten 'brel gnad gcig pa'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:1412: skabs 'dir nam mkha' sum sprugs kyi dgongs pa 'char te /
NK106(me)006:1413: stong gsal phyi'i nam mkha' la brten nas /
NK106(me)006:1414: rtog med nang gi nam mkha' shar dus /
NK106(me)006:1415: zang thal gsang ba'i nam mkha' rig stong rjen par rtogs te /
NK106(me)006:1416: thabs dang byin rlabs kyis bsgoms las mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK106(me)006:1417: 'di ni bal po ka ma la sh+ai la'i gdams pa mchog tu zab mo'o //
NK106(me)006:1418: thabs gsum pa rig pa rjen par /
NK106(me)006:1419: sbyangs pa mkha' la mig gtad ma yengs par //
NK106(me)006:1420: sems gsal spro bsdu med pa'i ngang de nas //
NK106(me)006:1421: sa rdo ri brag snod bcud thams cad kyang //
NK106(me)006:1422: zang thal nam mkha' gcig tu song bar bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1423: rang gi lus kyang rags pa'i mngon zhen med //
NK106(me)006:1424: sems dang nam mkha' dbyer med ngang du gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1425: phyi nang bar gsum rnam g.yeng med pa'i chos //
NK106(me)006:1426: nam mkha'i ngang der lus sems khong glod la //
NK106(me)006:1427: dran bsam yid la byed pa rang zhi'i ngang //
NK106(me)006:1428: spro bsdu med pa'i sems nyid rang sor gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1429: de tshe chos nyid bsam brjod 'das pa'i sems //
NK106(me)006:1430: gnyis med nam mkha' lta bu'i dgongs pa 'char //
NK106(me)006:1431: 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i snying po yin //
NK106(me)006:1432: nam mkha' la rig pa gtad pas stong par phyam gyis song dus /
NK106(me)006:1433: phyi snang ba'i dngos po sa rdo ri brag la
NK106(me)006:1434: sogs pa snod bcud thams cad zang thal rang yal
NK106(me)006:1435: song nas bar snang 'di dang 'dres par bsam dus
