NK106(me)006:1436: / rang gi lus kyang rang yal nam mkha' bzhin du song ste /
NK106(me)006:1437: thams cad nam mkha' la sprin dengs pa ltar phyi
NK106(me)006:1438: nang bar med har sang phyal ba'i ngang la sems
NK106(me)006:1439: spro bsdu med par bzhag pas /
NK106(me)006:1440: mtha' grol nam mkha' lta bu'i dgongs pa rang shar du byung ba ni /
NK106(me)006:1441: ka dag chos zad kyi dgongs pa zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)006:1443: rnal 'byor nam mkha'i bya lam gnas //
NK106(me)006:1446: don 'di gang yin nam mkha' dag la brtag par gyis //
NK106(me)006:1448: thabs des bsgoms pa'i nyams bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1449: de ltar bsgoms pas nyams kyang rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)006:1450: gang snang phyam phyam rags pa'i 'du shes med //
NK106(me)006:1451: nyin mtshan mi rtog ngang las 'bral mi phod /
NK106(me)006:1452: dug lnga rang zhi sems rgyud 'jam la des //
NK106(me)006:1453: chos kun nam mkha' 'dra ba'i nyams myong skye //
NK106(me)006:1454: 'phang ba gang gzung ba dang sbyang ba gsum bsgoms pa las /
NK106(me)006:1455: dbu ma'i rtsa sbug dang rig pa ngo bo'i nyams
NK106(me)006:1456: las ci snang gi snang ba thams cad sang seng
NK106(me)006:1457: khral khrol phyam phyam gcig tu shes te rags pa'i
NK106(me)006:1459: nyin mtshan rtog med la gnas pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1460: nyon mongs pa skye rgyu med par ltar song nas /
NK106(me)006:1461: rkyen gang la'ang bde dogs med pas ngang rgyud 'jam des su gnas pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1462: chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar skye ba med pa'i
NK106(me)006:1463: de kho na nyid rtogs nas bya rtsol gyi 'du
NK106(me)006:1464: shes med pa'o // yon tan ni /
NK106(me)006:1465: de ltar mi rtog gsum la goms pa yis //
NK106(me)006:1466: spyan dang mngon shes ting 'dzin yon tan 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1467: thabs dang shes rab zhi lhag zung 'brel bas //
NK106(me)006:1468: gnas skabs mthar thug don gnyis phun tshogs 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1469: thabs gsum pa goms pas ting nge 'dzin 'grub ste /
NK106(me)006:1471: ting nge 'dzin sngar med pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1472: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel dang /
NK106(me)006:1473: zhi lhag zung 'brel gyi lam grub nas /
NK106(me)006:1474: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi sa lam dang yon tan thams cad 'grub pa yin no //
NK106(me)006:1475: de dag gis dngos gzhi ji ltar bsgoms pa'i rim pa bstan zin to //
NK106(me)006:1476: don gsum pa dngos gzhi nyams su len pa la
NK106(me)006:1477: grogs phan pa'i yan lag mjug gi go cha yin
NK106(me)006:1479: gsum pa rjes kyi chos la rnam pa bzhi //
NK106(me)006:1480: nyams dang bogs 'byin rtogs pa 'bras bu'o //
NK106(me)006:1482: rgyas par bshad pa la bzhi las /
NK106(me)006:1484: nyams la gnyis las skyon med sngar bstan la //
NK106(me)006:1485: skyon can so so'i 'dzin zhen las byung ba //
NK106(me)006:1486: bde chags gsal chags mi rtog chags pa dang //
NK106(me)006:1487: mthar 'dzin zhen log dug dang 'dres pa gsum //
NK106(me)006:1488: bde log khams 'dzag 'dod chags rang ga dang //
NK106(me)006:1489: snying mi dga' dang bying ba shas che dang //
NK106(me)006:1490: gsal log rlung rgod zhe sdang rang ga dang //
NK106(me)006:1491: rnam rtog rags dang rgod cing 'phro shas che //
NK106(me)006:1492: mi rtog log pa gti mug rang ga dang //
NK106(me)006:1493: sems bying gnyid rmugs che dang 'du shes med //
NK106(me)006:1494: de ltar mthun dang log pa'i skyon can rnams //
NK106(me)006:1495: gang byung ngos gzung gnyen pos bcos par bya //
NK106(me)006:1496: de la goms pa na nyams 'char te /
NK106(me)006:1497: de yang bzang nyams dang ngan nyams gnyis su 'du ba las /
NK106(me)006:1498: bzang nyams ni sngar bstan zin to //
NK106(me)006:1499: ngan nyams la tshad med kyang /
NK106(me)006:1500: bsdu na bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa gsum
NK106(me)006:1501: gyi 'dzin zhen log pa las gyur pa gsum las
NK106(me)006:1502: / dang po ni bde bar bsgom dus bde ba'i ngang la chags pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1503: sems nyid bde stong du 'dug snyam pa'i 'dzin zhen dang /
NK106(me)006:1504: de las gzhan pa yang dag gi lam ma yin no snyam pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1505: de nyid la mthar 'dzin pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1506: bde ba 'dod chags kyi dug dang 'dres pa ma tshor ba ste /
NK106(me)006:1507: gnyen po las gyur pa lnga dang /
NK106(me)006:1508: bde log thig le'i gegs te 'dzag pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1509: 'dod chags rang gar 'char zhing dbang por nges pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1510: khams 'dzag pas snying mi dga' ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1511: nyog pas shes pa bying rmugs su gyur pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1512: yul yid la byed pa'i 'dod chags te /
NK106(me)006:1516: gsal ba'i ngang la chags pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1517: sems nyid gsal stong du 'dzin pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1518: gzhan gyi lam la btang ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1519: de la mthar zhen pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1520: gsal ba zhe sdang gi dug dang 'dres pa ma tshor ba ste /
NK106(me)006:1521: gnyen po las gyur pa lnga dang /
NK106(me)006:1522: gsal log rlung gi gegs te rlung ha cang rgod dang /
NK106(me)006:1523: zhe sdang rang ga mar 'chor ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1524: rnam rtog lhag gis rags pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1525: rlung 'thom pa za zir 'khor ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1526: gcig tu sdod snying mi 'dod pa ste /
NK106(me)006:1527: spang bya las gyur pa lnga'o //
NK106(me)006:1528: gsum pa ni mi rtog pa bsgom dus /
NK106(me)006:1529: rtog med kyi ngang la chags pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1530: sems nyid stong chad du 'dzin pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1531: lam gzhan la btang ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1532: stong pa la mthar 'dzin pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1533: gti mug gi dug dang 'dres pa ma tshor ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1534: gnyen po las gyur pa lnga dang /
NK106(me)006:1535: stong log rtog med kyi gegs te shes pa lung ma bstan gti mug rang ga dang /
NK106(me)006:1536: dngas ma phyin pas bying ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1537: gsal cha ma thon par rmugs pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1538: rang gsal rjen pa la ma bud pas stong pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1539: dran med stong pa la phyang chad kyi ngang la
NK106(me)006:1540: 'du shes kyi rgyu ba med par 'gag pa ste
NK106(me)006:1541: / spang cha las gyur pa lnga'o //
NK106(me)006:1542: de thams cad bsdoms pas sum cur gnas pa ni nyams su skyon can te /
NK106(me)006:1543: bcos thabs thun mong ba ni so so ngos bzung la /
NK106(me)006:1544: de'i gnyen por gang che bsten te go bar sla'o //
NK106(me)006:1545: thun mong ma yin pa ni rig pa rang ngo shes pa'i gnad gcig pu 'dis bcos te /
NK106(me)006:1546: gegs gang byung yang ngos bzung la /
NK106(me)006:1547: bla ma'i mos gus gsol 'debs dang bcas pa drag la byin phebs pa zhig byas nas /
NK106(me)006:1550: su gnod brtags pas de rnams ma rnyed pa rig pa zang ka /
NK106(me)006:1551: rjen pa de sang nge 'dug dus /
NK106(me)006:1552: thams cad rig pa'i rang mdangs su grol te /
NK106(me)006:1553: bar chad dngos grub tu shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa zhes bya'o //
NK106(me)006:1554: de yang gang shar ci byung skyon yon du gyur tshad /
NK106(me)006:1555: thams cad rig pa'i rol pa las gzhan med de /
NK106(me)006:1556: bde yang rig pa sdug kyang rig pa na yang rig pa dga' yang rig pa /
NK106(me)006:1557: kho ma gtogs pa gang yang med pas /
NK106(me)006:1558: gnad 'di go na shin tu skyid pa zhig lags so //
NK106(me)006:1559: kho bos gegs thams cad 'dir bsal bas shin tu skyid par byung ngo //
NK106(me)006:1560: gegs dang mi 'dod pa ci byung dus dge sbyor
NK106(me)006:1561: du hril 'gro ba zhig rnal 'byor pa la dgos
NK106(me)006:1562: pa lags so // de ma yin par thabs gzhan byed na sdug pa zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)006:1564: gang byung yang nang du rnam rtog la rig pa
NK106(me)006:1565: dngas phyed par mdzod dang gegs btsal gyis rnyed par
NK106(me)006:1566: mi gada'o // 'di ni rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen
NK106(me)006:1567: po'i gnad gal po che mngon du phyung nas nyams
NK106(me)006:1569: don gnyis pa ting nge 'dzin gyi bogs gong du 'byung ba'i thabs ma nyams pa bcos pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1570: gong du spel ba gnyis las /
NK106(me)006:1571: nyams skyon can bcos pa'i rim pa bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1572: bogs 'byin nyams bcos thabs dang gong du spel //
NK106(me)006:1573: nyams bcos pa yang rnam pa gsum nyid de //
NK106(me)006:1574: rab kyis lta bas bcos te chos rnams kun //
NK106(me)006:1575: blo btags sgyu 'dra ngo bo ngos gzung med //
NK106(me)006:1576: phyam gcig mkha' 'dra snyems bral rang ngos stong //
NK106(me)006:1577: 'dzin zhen med pa'i ngang der la bazla'o //
NK106(me)006:1578: gol sgrib nyams te gnas lugs chen por 'char //
NK106(me)006:1579: bar chad dge bskul rkyen ngan byang chub grogs //
NK106(me)006:1580: gzhi bde'i steng du blo bde rgyun mi 'chad //
NK106(me)006:1581: phyogs bral nam mkha' 'dra ba'i rtogs pa 'char //
NK106(me)006:1582: rnal 'byor pa rab kyis thams cad sgyu ma ltar
NK106(me)006:1583: ngo bo med par rtogs pas gegs gzhi grol chos
NK106(me)006:1585: de yang 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad sgyu ma'i
NK106(me)006:1586: rang bzhin du snang ba la rang bzhin med par
NK106(me)006:1588: brgyad stong pa'i brgya byin gyi le'u las /
NK106(me)006:1590: lha'i bu dag kho bo gal te mya ngan las
NK106(me)006:1591: 'das pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan
NK106(me)006:1592: zhig yod kyang de yang rmi lam lta bu sgyu
NK106(me)006:1594: de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma lta bu dang /
NK106(me)006:1596: mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos 'di dag ni gnyis
NK106(me)006:1597: su med de gnyis su byar med do zhes so
NK106(me)006:1598: // de'ang sems can la las kyi sgyu ma /
NK106(me)006:1599: rnal 'byor pa la nyams kyi sgyu ma /
NK106(me)006:1600: sangs rgyas la dag pa'i sgyu mar gnas pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste /
NK106(me)006:1602: sna tshogs sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul gyis //
NK106(me)006:1603: rang byung dag par 'char ba ni //
NK106(me)006:1604: rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub kyi //
NK106(me)006:1605: 'bras bu nyams snang sna tshogs pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1606: khams gsum sems can thams cad la //
NK106(me)006:1607: las dang nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'byung //
NK106(me)006:1608: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
NK106(me)006:1609: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi //
NK106(me)006:1610: gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
NK106(me)006:1611: phrin las dag pa'i stobs su 'char //
NK106(me)006:1613: de yang rnal 'byor pas gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi sgyu mar shes par bya ste /
NK106(me)006:1614: ye shes rgya mtsho'i rgyud las /
NK106(me)006:1615: gdod nas gzhi rnams ma grub pa //
NK106(me)006:1616: rang bzhin gnas pa'i sgyu ma ste //
NK106(me)006:1617: go dang rtag chad nyams dang ni //
NK106(me)006:1618: gang shar rtogs pa'i sgyu ma'o //
NK106(me)006:1620: de ltar bskyed rdzogs sgyu ma'i rol par chos thams cad shes par bya ste /
NK106(me)006:1622: lha sku snang stong sgyu ma yi //
NK106(me)006:1623: ngo bo brjod bral blo las 'das //
NK106(me)006:1624: rang bzhin dbyer med mtha' dang bral //
NK106(me)006:1625: mtshan nyid ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs //
NK106(me)006:1626: de ltar chos rnams thams cad kun //
NK106(me)006:1627: mkhas pas yongs su shes par bya //
NK106(me)006:1629: de ltar na rkyen ni sgyu ma med par gsal
NK106(me)006:1630: snang gi chos thams cad mtshon nas bden med bstan
NK106(me)006:1631: zhing / las kyi sgyu ma khams gsum las thar par bya ba'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:1632: chos kyi sgyu ma lam bsgom pa dang gang zag
NK106(me)006:1633: ngo bo med par bstan pa'i mthar ye shes sgyu
NK106(me)006:1634: ma rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub pas de ltar rtogs
NK106(me)006:1635: par gdams te / sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK106(me)006:1636: las kyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK106(me)006:1637: 'gro drug sems can thams cad do //
NK106(me)006:1638: rkyen gyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK106(me)006:1639: me long gzugs brnyan la sogs so //
NK106(me)006:1640: chos kyis sprul pa'i sgyu ma ni //
NK106(me)006:1641: nga yi 'khor gyi dge slong ngo //
NK106(me)006:1642: nga ni yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas //
NK106(me)006:1643: ye shes sprul pa'i sgyu ma'o //
NK106(me)006:1645: de ltar blang dor shes pas sgyu mar sbyong ba'i dus nas /
NK106(me)006:1646: chos thams cad yod med kyi mtha' las 'das par shes par bya ste /
NK106(me)006:1648: sgyu ma 'di ni yod med las 'das shing //
NK106(me)006:1649: dbu ma tsam du'ang mi gnas kun rdzob ste //
NK106(me)006:1650: chos rnams mi gnas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las //
NK106(me)006:1651: 'gag pa med pa'i rol par rang byung ba'o //
NK106(me)006:1653: 'di dag gi tshul rgyas par sgyu ma ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta bzang por blta'o //
NK106(me)006:1655: 'bring gis sgom pas bcos te dngas phyung la //
NK106(me)006:1656: shes pa 'jur la thebs shing dran pas gzung //
NK106(me)006:1657: ma yengs bde gsal mi rtog ngang la gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1658: yengs dang 'jur la ma thebs skyon yin pas //
NK106(me)006:1659: skad cig ma yengs ngang la gzhag pa gces //
NK106(me)006:1660: sgom skyon thams cad rig pa 'jur la ma thebs shing yengs pa las /
NK106(me)006:1661: rten rtsa rlung thig le dang brten pa sems kyi gegs rnams 'byung bas /
NK106(me)006:1662: 'dir rnal 'byor pa 'bring gis spyi dang bye brag
NK106(me)006:1663: gi bcos thabs gnyis su shes par bya ba las
NK106(me)006:1664: / spyir bcos pa ni gegs gang la'ang rig pa rang dngas bsgom pa ngos bzung nas /
NK106(me)006:1665: bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ngang la dngas phyin par bsgoms pas /
NK106(me)006:1666: sgom skyon de nyid sgom gyi ngo bo lhag med 'char ba yin no //
NK106(me)006:1668: ji ltar me yis tshig pa la //
NK106(me)006:1669: me de nyid kyis gso bar bya //
NK106(me)006:1670: ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs na //
NK106(me)006:1671: chu gzhan gyis ni 'byin pa ltar //
NK106(me)006:1672: zhes bshad pa dang chos mthun pa yin no //
NK106(me)006:1673: bye brag tu bcos pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)006:1674: bde log bcos pa la ni /
NK106(me)006:1675: khams 'dzag pa la rdo rje'i bum pa ru //
NK106(me)006:1676: h+aum las me 'bar lus nang khams kun bsregs //
NK106(me)006:1677: ci yang med pa'i ngang la bsgom pa sel //
NK106(me)006:1678: nad 'dzag gdon 'dzag gang la'ang gnad 'di zab //
NK106(me)006:1679: bde la 'dzin pa bshig nas stong par bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1680: 'dod chags rang ka'i sems la cher bltas pas //
NK106(me)006:1681: bcos bslad re dogs med pa'i ngang bzhag pas //
NK106(me)006:1682: 'dod chags rang grol bde stong ye shes 'char //
NK106(me)006:1683: snying mi dga' ba thig le nyams pa'i skyon //
NK106(me)006:1684: de la 'bar 'dzag bde ba'i bsam gtan bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1685: bying shas che na dngas snyigs ma phyed skyon //
NK106(me)006:1686: de la lus gnad drang por 'dug byas la //
NK106(me)006:1687: kha sbyar rlung bzung snying nang 'od kyis khengs //
NK106(me)006:1688: snang srid 'od khengs gsal stong bsgoms pas grol //
NK106(me)006:1689: bde stong bsgom dus gnyen po'i skyon lnga ni dga' brod du bzung ba las byung bas /
NK106(me)006:1690: dga' dus kyi rang ngo la bltas pas stong par
NK106(me)006:1691: sang gis 'gro ba'i ngang la bsgoms pas sel lo
NK106(me)006:1693: 'dod chags rang gar 'char na de'i ngo bo la
NK106(me)006:1694: gtad nas bsgoms pas 'dod chags rang grol bde ba
NK106(me)006:1696: khams 'dzag na rdo rje'i bum par h+aum mthing nag
NK106(me)006:1697: las me 'bar te sa bon thams cad tshig nas
NK106(me)006:1698: stong par bsams pas sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1699: bying rmugs che na sngar rlung bsgoms pa'i tshul des sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1700: snying mi dga' na mi thig le'i yar 'jog ni /
NK106(me)006:1701: lte ba'i a thung las me 'bar te /
NK106(me)006:1702: spyi bo'i ham la reg pas bdud rtsi babs pas lus khengs /
NK106(me)006:1703: yang ba spu'i bu ga'i bar me 'bar bas khams dngas ma thams cad bzhu ste /
NK106(me)006:1704: lus nang thams cad bde bas khyab par bsgoms te /
NK106(me)006:1706: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
NK106(me)006:1709: skra yi rtse mo'i khyon tsam ste //
NK106(me)006:1711: ba spu'i bu ga'i mtshams nas ni //
NK106(me)006:1712: byung nas phyogs bcur gnas pa yi //
NK106(me)006:1713: lha dang lha min sdigs par mdzod //
NK106(me)006:1716: gsal 'dzin nyams la 'dzin med chen por sbyong //
NK106(me)006:1717: gsal log rmugs na dngas gsal sems bsgom zhing //
NK106(me)006:1718: rgod cing 'phro na mig btsums snying nang du //
NK106(me)006:1719: 'od dang yi ge pad+ma ral gri dang //
NK106(me)006:1720: rgya gram bsgoms la je dma' je dma' las //
NK106(me)006:1721: snying ga'i nang las lung thag je ring song //
NK106(me)006:1722: 'og gzhi gser gyi sa gzhir babs par bsgom //
NK106(me)006:1723: des ni mi sel mi srid nges pa'i gnad //
NK106(me)006:1724: zhe sdang rang ka 'phro rgod tsan ne bzhag /
NK106(me)006:1725: gsal stong me long ye shes ngang du grol //
NK106(me)006:1726: gsal chags gnyen po mchog zin lnga ni /
NK106(me)006:1727: rang ngo de ngos bzung la bltas pas yul med rang grol la 'gro ba yin no //
NK106(me)006:1728: spang bya lnga las zhe sdang rang ka de'i ngo bo la bltas pas grol lo //
NK106(me)006:1729: rmugs 'thoms la dngas phyungs nas bsgoms pas sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1730: rlung rgod na mig btsums snying nang du lha'i yi ge bsgoms pas sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1731: sems rab tu 'phro zhing ma zin na snying nang
NK106(me)006:1732: nas pad+ma'am rdo rje rgya gram la sogs pa'i thur
NK106(me)006:1733: du yu ba'am thag pa je ring la song nas
NK106(me)006:1734: dbang chen gser gyi sa gzhi la babs te bstan
NK106(me)006:1735: par bsams pa'i ngang la ring du bsgoms pas sel
NK106(me)006:1737: mi rtog pa'i las bcos pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1738: mi rtog ngang 'char 'dzin med gnad kyis sbyang //
NK106(me)006:1739: gti mug sems de ngos gzung cer gyis brtag /
NK106(me)006:1740: skad cig rang grol chos dbyings ye shes 'char //
NK106(me)006:1741: bying zhing rmugs te 'du shes med pa na //
NK106(me)006:1742: snying gar 'od bsgoms tshangs bug nas 'thon te //
NK106(me)006:1743: gzhu gang tsam gyi nam mkhar ldeng nge gnas //
NK106(me)006:1744: de la sems bzung spros kun bral bar gnas //
NK106(me)006:1745: 'di ni yang zab gnad kyi gdams pa yin //
NK106(me)006:1746: mi rtog pa bsgom dus gnyen po la zhen pa lnga ni rang ngo la bltas pas sel la /
NK106(me)006:1747: spang bya lnga las gti mug gi sems rang ka
NK106(me)006:1748: ma de rang ngo la bltas pas rtog med rang
NK106(me)006:1749: dngas thon dus chos dbyings ye shes su grol lo
NK106(me)006:1750: // bying rmugs dang 'du shes med pa la sngon rol der dngas byung bas kyang sel la /
NK106(me)006:1751: snying nas 'od sgo nga ltar 'tsher ba 'phar te /
NK106(me)006:1752: steng gi gzhu gang gi nam mkha' la lding nge yod par sems bzung bas sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1753: 'di ni rig pa gsal ka ston pa zhes bya
NK106(me)006:1754: bar slob dpon chen po dga' rab rdo rje'i man
NK106(me)006:1756: spyir ni gang la'ang 'dzin med gnad du che //
NK106(me)006:1757: re dogs bral na gegs rnams kun las grol //
NK106(me)006:1758: stong gsal sems nyid dngas pa'i ngang nyid du //
NK106(me)006:1759: blo yi rnam pa spros dang bral bar gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1760: gegs dang spang bya'i 'phrang las grol bar nges //
NK106(me)006:1761: gegs dang bzang ngan gang la'ang ngos zin na rig pa las med pas /
NK106(me)006:1762: rig pa 'dzin med stong gsal du bzhag pa tsam gyis sel te /
NK106(me)006:1764: gang la zhen pa yod na de yang thongs //
NK106(me)006:1765: rtogs par gyur na thams cad de yin te //
NK106(me)006:1768: tha mas spyod pas bcos pa'i rim pa yang //
NK106(me)006:1769: lta stangs rdzas dang rten 'brel gsum nyid las //
NK106(me)006:1770: spyi yi lta stangs rnam snang chos bdun te //
NK106(me)006:1771: skyil krung mig mi 'gul dang rlung dal dang //
NK106(me)006:1772: mnyam gzhag mgrin pa dgug dang lce rtse rkan //
NK106(me)006:1773: sna rtser mig phab blta bas rlung sems snyoms //
NK106(me)006:1774: bying rgod med cing ma nor bsam gtan skye //
NK106(me)006:1775: 'di ltar skyon kun lus gnad 'khrugs pa yis //
NK106(me)006:1776: rtsa 'khrugs rlung 'khrugs thig le 'khrugs las byung //
NK106(me)006:1777: de bas ma 'khrugs mnyam par gzhag pa gces //
NK106(me)006:1778: yon tan yang ni rtsa thig rlung gsum nyid //
NK106(me)006:1779: mi g.yo gnad du song las 'byung bas na //
NK106(me)006:1780: de phyir gnad 'di rtogs pa rab tu gces //
NK106(me)006:1781: de la gegs dang skyed med pa thams cad rtsa
NK106(me)006:1782: rlung gnad du gtong ba'i lus gnad ma shes na
NK106(me)006:1783: las 'byung zhing / yon tan yang lus gnad legs par bcas pa las 'byung ste /
NK106(me)006:1784: rdo rje'i lus las rtsa thig rlung gsum gyi 'phro
NK106(me)006:1785: 'du legs nyes kyi byed pas bde sdug gi snang
NK106(me)006:1786: ba dang nyams bzang ngan du 'char ba'i phyir ro
NK106(me)006:1787: // sngon rang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i pha rol drang
NK106(me)006:1788: srong nags na 'khod pa'i drung du phyin pa na
NK106(me)006:1789: // / de dag la la ni nyal /
NK106(me)006:1790: la la ni khros pa la sogs pa mthong na spre'usa lus gnad bcos pas /
NK106(me)006:1791: de dag gi rnam snang chos bdun de la ngo mtshar skyes pas /
NK106(me)006:1793: ring por ma thogs par bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon
NK106(me)006:1794: par shes pa lnga thob par 'dul ba lung las
NK106(me)006:1795: bshad do // de'i phyir lus drang por bsrangs te skyil krung bca' ba /
NK106(me)006:1801: mig thur la dbab pa ste bdun po bcas pa tsam gyis bsam gtan ngang gis skye ste /
NK106(me)006:1802: rtsa rlung thig le rang bzhin gyis 'ching zhing rig pa rang gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK106(me)006:1804: 'khrul 'khor lus sbyong gzhan dang 'dra ba las //
NK106(me)006:1805: khyad par dal 'jam ma 'khrugs gnad du che //
NK106(me)006:1806: 'jam la rtsub dang rtsub la 'jam pa gnad //
NK106(me)006:1807: khams dang bstun pa shin tu gces pa yin //
NK106(me)006:1808: lus sbyong yang rtsa rlung gnad du 'gro ba'i grogs te /
NK106(me)006:1809: 'chi med 'khrul 'khor sum cu rtsa gnyis gnad la sogs pa /
NK106(me)006:1810: rtsa rlung pa gzhan dang 'dra ba las /
NK106(me)006:1811: khyad par du de dag gis lus ma 'khrugs par dal 'jam du bya ba gnad do //
NK106(me)006:1812: rlung yang 'jam rlung la bogs rtsub rlung gis 'don
NK106(me)006:1813: cing rtsub rlung la 'jam rlung gis 'don pa dang
NK106(me)006:1814: / gnyis ka'i rlung ma ning gi rlung gis rnal
NK106(me)006:1815: 'byor gyi bogs 'don pa ni gnad gal po che'o
NK106(me)006:1816: / // bde gsal mi rtog pa gsum gyi lus gnad bye brag tu bshad pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1817: bye brag bde la lag pa gru mor bsnol //
NK106(me)006:1818: mig phab bde la sems bzung gnad yin no //
NK106(me)006:1819: gsal la lag gnyis pus mo'i steng du dgab //
NK106(me)006:1820: rlung dal mig ni bar snang har por blta //
NK106(me)006:1821: mi rtog chos bdun rang kar gnas pas 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1822: bde ba bsgom dus chos bdun las lag ngar gnyis
NK106(me)006:1823: pa snol bas bde ba myong byed dang khams dang
NK106(me)006:1825: gsal ba bsgom dus mjing pa cung zad phyir bskyed /
NK106(me)006:1826: lag pa pus mo la bkab rlung dal /
NK106(me)006:1827: mig har por gtad pas 'od gsal gyi rang sor gnas pa'i gnad do //
NK106(me)006:1828: mi rtog pa ni chos bdun rang lugs kyis 'grub bo //
NK106(me)006:1829: nyams log pa'i gegs rdzas kyis bcos pa ni gsum nyid de /
NK106(me)006:1830: rdzas ni dus dang mthun pa'i gnas dang grogs //
NK106(me)006:1831: bza' btung la sogs nyams la gang phan bsten //
NK106(me)006:1832: bde ba'i rdzas kha zas bcud can dang /
NK106(me)006:1833: sman sbrang rtsi'i ril bu bza' ba dang /
NK106(me)006:1834: grogs phyag rgya mtshan ldan bsten pa la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1835: gsal ba'i rdzas kha zas bsil ba dang gnas mtho zhing snang ba che ba la sogs pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1836: mi rtog pas rdzas gnas dro zhing 'thibs pa dang /
NK106(me)006:1838: spyod lam dal bar gnas pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1839: nyams rten 'brel gyis bcos pa ni gsum nyid de /
NK106(me)006:1840: rten 'brel khams 'dzag pa la gzhon nu mas //
NK106(me)006:1841: bkal ba'i skud pa sum sgril sngags bzlas te //
NK106(me)006:1842: sked par bcings pas thig le bsrung ba yin //
NK106(me)006:1843: rtog pa 'phro na tsan+dana ge sar dang //
NK106(me)006:1844: zhun chen ril bu bsten pas mi rtog 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1845: rmugs na gur gum ga pur byang chub sems //
NK106(me)006:1846: ril bus ting 'dzin 'grub par rgyud las gsungs //
NK106(me)006:1847: bde nyams mkhas 'dzag na bu mo grong pa'i chos
NK106(me)006:1848: kyis ma gos pas bkal ba'i skud pa sum sgril
NK106(me)006:1849: la / khro bor bskyed nas drag sngags bzlas pa'i
NK106(me)006:1850: sngags mdud bdun byas pa'i srad bu sked par bcings
NK106(me)006:1851: pa'i sna gcig rdo rje'i rtsa bar bcings la nyal
NK106(me)006:1852: la / bas thub bo // rtog pa 'phro na gsal nyams 'grib ste /
NK106(me)006:1855: mi'i zhun chen sbyar ba'i ril bu lto stong la bsten pas bsam gtan 'grub bo //
NK106(me)006:1856: bying rmugs ni mi rtog pa'i nyams 'phrog pa ste /
NK106(me)006:1859: byang sems dkar dmar gyi ril bu bsten pas sel lo //
NK106(me)006:1861: tsan+dana ge sar zhun chen gyis //
NK106(me)006:1862: rang bzhin sems dal bsam gtan 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1863: gur gum ga pur byang chub sems //
NK106(me)006:1864: mkha' mnyam byang chub rdo rje'i rdzas //
NK106(me)006:1865: mi bskyod bsten pa'i rnal 'byor gyis //
NK106(me)006:1866: rgas shing zil gyis gnon pa 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1868: don gsum pa bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ye shes gong du 'phel ba la /
NK106(me)006:1869: spyi dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis las /
NK106(me)006:1871: bde gsal mi rtog skyon med gong 'phel na //
NK106(me)006:1872: dmigs pa gang rung sems bzung mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)006:1873: dang po dmigs yul ma gtad bsgoms pa yis //
NK106(me)006:1874: de rjes dmigs med ngang du lhan gyis 'gro //
NK106(me)006:1875: gnad 'di shin tu yang zab mchog yin pas //
NK106(me)006:1876: skal ldan rnams kyis dang du blang bar bya //
NK106(me)006:1877: mtshan bcas yin zhes spong ba blun po'i lam //
NK106(me)006:1878: nyams myong med pa'i lugs ngan dor bar bya //
NK106(me)006:1879: bde stong chen po'i dmigs rten thig le 'bar 'dzag /
NK106(me)006:1880: gsal stong gi dmigs rten rlung gi kha dog mi
NK106(me)006:1881: rtog gi rten nam mkha' dag pa rnams la ches
NK106(me)006:1882: cher ma yengs par sems gtad dus /
NK106(me)006:1883: rtog pa gzhan rnams der nub la /
NK106(me)006:1884: de yang de'i rdzas la yid la mi byed par
NK106(me)006:1885: lhan gyis bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ngang so so
NK106(me)006:1887: zab mo'i don gnad las skyes pa ste /
NK106(me)006:1889: dmigs pa gang yang rung zhig la //
NK106(me)006:1890: yid ni ting nge 'dzin la gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1891: ci yang med cing bsgoms pa yis //
NK106(me)006:1892: phyi nas de yang rab tu spong //
NK106(me)006:1894: kha cig mtshan bcas des ci bya zer ba ni //
NK106(me)006:1895: gnad med la myong ba til shun tsam med pa
NK106(me)006:1896: ste yid brtan du mi rung bar shes par byos
NK106(me)006:1897: shig / bye brag tu bshad pa la gsum las /
NK106(me)006:1898: bde ba'i bogs 'byin bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1899: khyad par bde dmigs bogs 'byin dam pa ni //
NK106(me)006:1900: 'og rlung 'then la gsang ba'i gnas nyid nas //
NK106(me)006:1901: thig le yar thim spyi gtsug nyid du thim //
NK106(me)006:1902: gang yang dmigs med ngang du gzhag par bya //
NK106(me)006:1903: de rjes steng 'og kha sbyar rlung bzung la //
NK106(me)006:1904: snying gar sems gtad skye med ngang la gzhag /
NK106(me)006:1905: bde gsal spros bral ngang la gnas pa yin //
NK106(me)006:1906: 'dir mchog gi rnal 'byor pa phyag rgya dang mnyam par sbyor la /
NK106(me)006:1907: thun mong gi rnal 'byor pa yid kyi rig ma bsten nas /
NK106(me)006:1908: thig le gsang bar bab dus rlung drag tu 'then nas /
NK106(me)006:1909: thig le ba thag lta bur yar 'dus te spyi bo'i ham la thim /
NK106(me)006:1910: de yang mi dmigs par bzhag pa'i rjes la /
NK106(me)006:1911: rlung kha sbyar bzung nas yid la mi byed pa'i ngang la glod pas /
NK106(me)006:1912: bde stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no //
NK106(me)006:1915: skye bo mi bsrun drung dag tu //
NK106(me)006:1916: rnal 'byor pa ni gnas pa'i tshe //
NK106(me)006:1917: bstan la smod pas 'jigs pa'i phyir //
NK106(me)006:1918: rang sems tsam la mos pa bya //
NK106(me)006:1920: 'di ni gnad cung zad bshad na /
NK106(me)006:1921: rang nyid yi dam yab yum du bsgoms pa'i mdun du /
NK106(me)006:1922: mi'i bu mo shin tu mdzes pa zhig bsams la chags pas yun ring bltas nas /
NK106(me)006:1923: de rdo rje phag mor bskyed pa'i mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs te snyoms par zhugs pas /
NK106(me)006:1924: lte ba'i a las me 'bar te spyi gtsug gi ham zhu bas /
NK106(me)006:1925: thig le rim gyis babs par bsam zhing /
NK106(me)006:1926: bsrub pa dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba bya /
NK106(me)006:1927: 'og rlung 'then nas lus sgrims shing mdoms byed 'dzum mang du bya /
NK106(me)006:1928: de nas thig le rim gyis mgrin pa snying ga lte ba rdo rje'i rtsa ba /
NK106(me)006:1929: de nas rtse mor yum gyi ze'u 'bru la dkar lhag gis byung bas /
NK106(me)006:1933: lhan cig skyes dag'i bar rim pas ngos bzung la /
NK106(me)006:1934: thig le 'chor ba snyam byed pa'am /
NK106(me)006:1935: 'phro gcod na 'og rlung sor bzhag steng rlung drag tu mnan /
NK106(me)006:1938: rdo rje'i bu gar phata kyis dngas ma 'ub kyis drang h+aum phata kyi gyen du phul te /
NK106(me)006:1939: thig le thams cad spyi gtsug tu drangs /
NK106(me)006:1940: mthar yum yang bde ba'i ngo bor zhu nas drangs pa ham la bstims /
NK106(me)006:1941: ham yang mi dmigs pa'i ngang la bzhag nas /
NK106(me)006:1943: de dag gi dus su lus gnad dang dmigs pa'i chings bsdam pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1944: bar bar seng ge rtsal sprugs la sogs pa //
NK106(me)006:1945: dbab bzlog drang zhing dgram dang la bzla ba'i //
NK106(me)006:1946: 'khrul 'khor dmigs gnad mthong ba brgyud bzhin bya //
NK106(me)006:1947: zhes mdor bzhag nas rgyas par bstan pa las /
NK106(me)006:1949: dbab pa 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni //
NK106(me)006:1950: ro stod smad gsigs gnon pa lta bur bya //
NK106(me)006:1951: dmigs pa ham las byang sems drangs pa yis //
NK106(me)006:1952: gsang bar babs dus bde la dmig sa pa gtad //
NK106(me)006:1953: seng ge rtsal sprugs ni lus sug bzhi btsugs nas
NK106(me)006:1954: sprugs te mjing pa dgye la 'og rlung 'then la
NK106(me)006:1955: kha bzhad de ha chung ngur 'dod pa ste /
NK106(me)006:1956: dbab bzlog dgram pa thams cad spyi la phan pa'i gnad yin no //
NK106(me)006:1957: khyad par du dbab pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1958: skyil krung bcas pa'i mdun du yid kyi rig ma
NK106(me)006:1959: dang zhugs par dmigs la 'khyud pa'i phyag rgya dang
NK106(me)006:1960: ro stod yar seng stod pa des ro smad chir
NK106(me)006:1961: chir dbab cing / ham las byang sems gsang bar
NK106(me)006:1962: babs pas bde ba rgyas pa la sems gzung ngo
NK106(me)006:1963: chir dbab cing / // 'dis ni thig le rtsa dmigs thams cad du khyad par dbab pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1964: bzlog pa de nas gyen du drangs pa ste /
NK106(me)006:1965: lag gnyis mkhal khung rgya mtsho brag la sbyar //
NK106(me)006:1966: 'og rlung 'then la lce rtse rkan la sbyar //
NK106(me)006:1967: mig sprin bzlog cing mgo sgril 'dar ba bzhin //
NK106(me)006:1968: dmigs pa thig le ba thag brgyus pa bzhin //
NK106(me)006:1969: gcig la gcig thim spyi gtsug bar du bsam //
NK106(me)006:1970: gsang bar thig le phab pa de gyen du bzlog pa ni /
NK106(me)006:1972: lag pa gnyis mkhal khung du bsnol /
NK106(me)006:1973: gsum pa sgal tshigs la stongs kyis sbyar /
NK106(me)006:1977: dbugs bsdams te mjing pa mar bardzangasa pas mgo dar po che bskyod pa ltar 'dar te /
NK106(me)006:1978: thig le ba thag brgyus pa lta bu gsang ba
NK106(me)006:1979: nas spyi gtsug tu je thim la ham gi bar
NK106(me)006:1980: du bsams pas dngas ma 'dren pa'o //
NK106(me)006:1981: de nas lus thams cad khyab par /
NK106(me)006:1982: dgram pa gzhu 'gengs rkang lag rtsal sprugs bya //
NK106(me)006:1983: si zhes lce rtse so sbyar rlung phyir bus //
NK106(me)006:1985: seng ge rtsal sprugs de byas rjes /
NK106(me)006:1987: si zhes lce rtse so sbyar /
NK106(me)006:1989: ba spu'i bar khyab par khrems shing /
NK106(me)006:1990: dmigs pa rtsa gnas thams cad thig les khyab par
NK106(me)006:1991: bsams pa'i skad cig la dran med stong par gzhag
NK106(me)006:1993: la bzla gan rkyal rlung sems sos dal la //
NK106(me)006:1994: gar yang mi rtog cir yang mi 'dzin par //
NK106(me)006:1995: rang bzhin spros dang bral ba'i ngang la gzhag /'di yis gegs med bde chen byang chub 'grub //
NK106(me)006:1997: gan rkyal khong glod nas rang babs sos dal gyi ngang la dran med brgyal bar gzhag go //
NK106(me)006:1998: 'di ni bde stong ka dag tu la bzla ba zhes bya ba ste /
NK106(me)006:1999: thig le'i gegs med chos nyid kyi dbyings zin /
NK106(me)006:2000: don gyi rang yul rnyed pa zhes bya'o //
NK106(me)006:2001: de nas drang por 'dug la don de nyid la rgyun du bsgom par bya'o //
NK106(me)006:2002: de ma shes par rtag tu dbab bzlog dgram gsum la sbyangs kyang /
NK106(me)006:2003: rtsol ba can phye chad pa'i lam zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)006:2004: gnas lugs don gyi nges pa 'di bas phyi ma la'ang mi rnyed pas /
NK106(me)006:2005: gnad 'di rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po thabs kyis che ba zhes bya'o //
NK106(me)006:2007: gsal ba rlung gi bogs 'byin dam pa yang //
NK106(me)006:2008: 'jam rtsub gcig gis gcig gi bogs 'byin la //
NK106(me)006:2009: khyad par nang bzung phyir bzung gcig gis gcig /
NK106(me)006:2010: dal 'jam phan tshun gnad dang bsre ba gces //
NK106(me)006:2011: grangs dang kha dog reg bya dbyibs la sogs //
NK106(me)006:2012: du ma'i thabs la bslab pa'ang gsungs mod kyi //
NK106(me)006:2013: 'di ni gcig gis kun 'grub man ngag la //
NK106(me)006:2014: 'di ltar bslab pa gnad kyi rgyal po yin //
NK106(me)006:2015: 'jam rlung bsgoms pa'i rjes la rtsub rlung bzung na yon tan gsar du skye la /
NK106(me)006:2016: rtsub rlung pas kyang 'jam rlung la'ang mtshungs so //
NK106(me)006:2017: rlung nad 'dzin pas phyir der bzung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2018: phyir 'dzin pas nang du bag re bzung ba ni gnad dam pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2019: gzhan yang rlung khug pa'i grangs lam yengs par sems gzung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2020: 'byung ba lnga'i kha dog gi rlung la sems gzung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2021: reg bya tsha grang la sems gzung ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2022: rlung gi dbyibs tha dad pa la sems gzung bas bogs 'byin pa sna tshogs su bshad kyang /
NK106(me)006:2023: de kun dmigs pa 'dzin pa tsam las /
NK106(me)006:2024: chos nyid la dngos su sbyor mi nus so //
NK106(me)006:2025: skabs 'dir gnad gcig gis rlung dbu ma'i nang du
NK106(me)006:2026: 'chings nas chos nyid yul med du 'char ba'i thabs
NK106(me)006:2027: bstan pa ni / lus gnad sngar bzhin khyad par mig mi 'gul //
NK106(me)006:2028: rlung ni kha sna gsum mnyam shin tu dal //
NK106(me)006:2029: tha mal rang grol ngang la lhod kyis klod //
NK106(me)006:2030: sems gnad gang du'ang mi gzung rang bzhin bya //
NK106(me)006:2031: de rjes gan rkyal rkang lag brkyang bya ste /
NK106(me)006:2032: ha zhes drag la sems ni mkha' dkyil gtad //
NK106(me)006:2033: yeng med spro bsdu bral bar lhan ner gzhag /
NK106(me)006:2034: rlung sems rang grol bde ba'i ngang gnas pas //
NK106(me)006:2035: gegs med yon tan 'char sgo dpag tu med //
NK106(me)006:2036: lus rnam snang gi chos bdun las /
NK106(me)006:2037: rlung kha sna mnyam du rab tu dal zhing /
NK106(me)006:2038: sems rtog med du dar cig glod pa ni rlung grangs su gzhug pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2039: de tshe dbu mar bcings pas gang du'ang mi rtog pa'i tshe /
NK106(me)006:2040: rlung sems ka dag tu la bzla ba'i phyir rkang lag brgyangs nas gan rkyal la nyal te /
NK106(me)006:2042: ha drag po gsum brjod nas rlung phyir bzung ste /
NK106(me)006:2043: sems rang sor bzhag pas gang la'ang 'dzin rtog med
NK106(me)006:2044: pa'i ye shes chos nyid zad pa'i dgongs pa skad
NK106(me)006:2046: rdzogs pa chen po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)006:2047: chos sku kun tu bzang po'i go 'phang la reg pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2048: de ltar yun du bsgoms pa las yon tan gyi 'char tshul bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:2049: lus yang rgyu ba med dang spros kun zhi //
NK106(me)006:2050: sems gsal rab tu dngas shing mngon shes 'char //
NK106(me)006:2051: rkang mgyogs 'grub cing mdog snum ting 'dzin skye //
NK106(me)006:2052: rlung sems dbu mar tshud pa'i rtags rnams 'byung //
NK106(me)006:2053: yang zab mchog gi gnad yin shin tu gsang //
NK106(me)006:2054: lus shing bal ltar yang ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2055: dbugs rgyu ba mi tshor ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2056: rnam rtog spros pa zhi ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2059: mngon shes phra mo 'char ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2061: mdog snum zhing 'od dang ldan pa dang /
NK106(me)006:2062: ting nge 'dzin gsar du skye ba dang /
NK106(me)006:2063: du ba la sogs pa'i rtags bcu rnam dag mthong ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
NK106(me)006:2065: mi rtog nam mkha' lta bu'i bogs 'byin yang //
NK106(me)006:2066: lus sems khong glod dmigs pa rtse gcig bzung //
NK106(me)006:2067: gcig la ma yengs ches cher bltas pa yis //
NK106(me)006:2068: rnam rtog gzhan rnams de yi ngang nub ste //
NK106(me)006:2069: dmigs rten de la rtog pa'ang rab zhi nas //
NK106(me)006:2070: snang la der 'dzin med pa'i stong pa 'char //
NK106(me)006:2071: lus rnam snang gi chos bdun las khyad par du
NK106(me)006:2072: lha sku la sogs pa cig la cer re bltas
NK106(me)006:2073: dus / rtog pa gzhan thams cad lha skur nub pa dang /
NK106(me)006:2074: lha skur rtog pa'ang ngang gis zhi nas snang stong rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'char ro //
NK106(me)006:2076: 'di ni gnad yin gzhan yang mi ltar bslab //
NK106(me)006:2077: res 'ga' dmigs pa phyir bzang rlung bus la //
NK106(me)006:2078: phyi ru tsam gnas bzhag pas mi rtog skye //
NK106(me)006:2079: res 'ga' nang bzung stod smad gang rung du //
NK106(me)006:2080: dmigs rten cig la ma yengs tsan ne gzhag /
NK106(me)006:2081: res 'ga' rten med shes pa rang bzhin gzhag /
NK106(me)006:2082: yul snang der 'dzin med pa'i ngang la gnas //
NK106(me)006:2083: 'di ni mi rtog chos sku'i dgongs pa ste //
NK106(me)006:2084: gnad la brten nas rang byung khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)006:2085: res 'ga' rlung phyir bzung nas sa rdo ri brag
NK106(me)006:2086: la sogs pa cer re bltas pas mi rtog pa
NK106(me)006:2087: skye'o // res 'ga' rlung nang du bzung nas 'khor
NK106(me)006:2088: lo bzhi rtsa yig gam 'od dam lha sku gang
NK106(me)006:2089: rung la sems gtad pas 'grub bo //
NK106(me)006:2090: res 'ga' rten med kyi shes pa 'dzin med du
NK106(me)006:2091: ha ra re bzhag pas bar med mnyam pa'i ye
NK106(me)006:2092: shes skye'o // mjug bsdu ba ni /
NK106(me)006:2093: bde gsal mi rtog spyi yi bogs 'byin ni //
NK106(me)006:2094: tshogs bsags sgrib sbyong bskyed rdzogs bsgom pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2095: lam zab bla ma'i rnal 'byor mchog tu basngagasa //
NK106(me)006:2096: 'di ni mthar thug gnad kyi gdams pa ste //
NK106(me)006:2097: skal bzang thar pa 'dod pas dang du blang //
NK106(me)006:2098: de ltar bsod nams kyi las byas pas /
NK106(me)006:2099: bsod nams ma yin pa rtogs pa'i phyir /
NK106(me)006:2100: bsags sbyong lam gyi bogs 'byin du zab ste /
NK106(me)006:2101: sangs rgyas mang byed kyi mdo las /
NK106(me)006:2102: bsod nams bsags pa dag ni bsam pa 'grub //
NK106(me)006:2104: don gsum pa gnas lugs kyi lam la nor bas thob pa'i rtogs pa bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:2105: de ltar bsgoms pas shar ba'i rtogs pa yang //
NK106(me)006:2106: ro mnyam gcig ste tha dad du ma med //
NK106(me)006:2107: phyogs gsum gcig tu 'du ba'i don sa dang //
NK106(me)006:2108: chu bran tha dad rgya mtshor gcig pa ltar //
NK106(me)006:2109: bde gsal mi rtog thabs gsum gang bsgoms kyang //
NK106(me)006:2110: sems nyid ma skyes nam mkha'i rang bzhin du //
NK106(me)006:2111: blo yi 'jug pa rab zhi thim pa na //
NK106(me)006:2112: yod med spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems //
NK106(me)006:2113: 'od gsal gshis kyi nyi ma khong nas 'char //
NK106(me)006:2114: grub gsal 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rtogs pa ste //
NK106(me)006:2115: mkha' mnyam bde gshegs snying po'i rang bzhin no //
NK106(me)006:2116: phyogs tha dad nas 'ongs kyang don sa gcig tu 'du ba ltar /
NK106(me)006:2117: bde gsal mi rtog pa'i thabs so so nas bsgoms kyang /
NK106(me)006:2118: rtogs pa'i ngo bo rig stong zang ka rjen pa gcig tu skyel so gcig ste /
NK106(me)006:2119: de'i ngo bo ni gang du'ang ma grub pa'i rig
NK106(me)006:2120: pa phyal ba bar med 'od gsal dag pa ste
NK106(me)006:2121: / rang rig sgrib g.yogs med pa rang gsal ba'o //
NK106(me)006:2122: 'di ni dus rtag par yod kyang bla ma'i byin rlabs zhugs pa 'gas rig pa'i spyod yul /
NK106(me)006:2123: 'di'i ngo bo ni rang gsal la yul med pa /
NK106(me)006:2124: gting gsal rkyen la mi ltos pa /
NK106(me)006:2125: ye gsal glo bur du ma byung ba'o //
NK106(me)006:2126: don 'di la 'od gsal ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
NK106(me)006:2128: sems la sems ma mchis te /
NK106(me)006:2129: sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba'o zhes gsungs so //
NK106(me)006:2130: 'od gsal de yang ji ltar zhe na /
NK106(me)006:2131: de tshe rtse gcig dngas gsal rnyog med pa //
NK106(me)006:2132: zhi lhag yangs pa'i bsam gtan rgya mtsho la //
NK106(me)006:2133: phyogs bral 'dzin med gzugs brnyan rang bzhin med //
NK106(me)006:2134: chos kun rtogs pa'i ngo bo zung du 'brel //
NK106(me)006:2135: snang ba sgyu 'dra stong pa der 'dzin med //
NK106(me)006:2136: zung 'jug dbyer med dgongs klong yangs pa ni //
NK106(me)006:2137: gnad nas byung ba'i 'od gsal khong nas shar //
NK106(me)006:2138: rgya mtsho dngas pa la gzugs brnyan byung yang chu las gzhan du grub pa med cing /
NK106(me)006:2139: gzugs brnyan dang char pa chu gnyis gcig dang du mar med la /
NK106(me)006:2140: snang la ngos gzung med pa ltar /
NK106(me)006:2141: sems nyid dngas pa'i ngo bo ni sna tshogs kyi snang ba shar yang /
NK106(me)006:2142: yul snang gis sems la ma gos /
NK106(me)006:2143: sems kyis yul snang la ma bzung /
NK106(me)006:2144: dbang shes la snang yang 'dzin pas ma bslad pas /
NK106(me)006:2145: sgyu ma rang sa na gsal la /
NK106(me)006:2146: blo rtse gcig rang gnas kyi zhi gnas dang /
NK106(me)006:2147: rang gsal zang ka'i lhag mthong gnyis ngo bo rdzas gcig tu gnas dus /
NK106(me)006:2149: stong pa sems kyis mi 'dzin pa'i phyir snang la rang bzhin med pa'i 'od gsal zhes bya'o //
NK106(me)006:2151: thams cad las ni sems bsus nas //
NK106(me)006:2152: nang gi bdag nyid g.yo med par //
NK106(me)006:2153: gnas na'ang mig gis gzugs dag ni //
NK106(me)006:2154: mthong ba'i blo de dbang skyes yin //
NK106(me)006:2156: su'i mthu las shar zhe na /
NK106(me)006:2157: bla ma'i byin rlabs rang byung ye shes ni //
NK106(me)006:2158: tshig dang bsam brjod 'das tshe mthong ba ste //
NK106(me)006:2159: de lta bu nyid dus su mthong ba ni //
NK106(me)006:2160: dus gsum dus med snga phyi dbye bsal med //
NK106(me)006:2161: shes rab pha rol phyin yin dbu ma ste //
NK106(me)006:2162: spros dang sdug bsngal zhi byed phyag rgya che //
NK106(me)006:2163: snying po'i chos nyid rdzogs pa chen po ste //
NK106(me)006:2164: gdod ma'i zad pa gshis kyi gnas lugs nyid //
NK106(me)006:2165: 'od gsal sems nyid rang byung ye shes yin //
NK106(me)006:2166: ming mang btags kyang don gyi ngo bo gcig /
NK106(me)006:2167: chos nyid smra bsam brjod 'das byang chub sems //
NK106(me)006:2168: 'khor 'das gnyis med nam mkha' lta bu yin //
NK106(me)006:2169: bla ma dam pa'i byin rlabs kyis sems nyid 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo mthong ste /
NK106(me)006:2171: bla mas smras pa gang gi snying zhugs pa //
NK106(me)006:2172: lag pa'i mthil na gnas pa'i gter mthong 'dra //
NK106(me)006:2174: de yang smra bsam brjod pa las 'das pa nam
NK106(me)006:2175: mkha' ltar mthong ba'i dus der snga phyi ris med
NK106(me)006:2176: bsal bzhag las 'das par rtogs pas 'ching ba kun
NK106(me)006:2177: las grol te / mngon rtogs rgyan las /
NK106(me)006:2178: 'di la bsal bya ci yang med //
NK106(me)006:2179: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
NK106(me)006:2180: yang dag nyid la yang dag blta //
NK106(me)006:2181: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
NK106(me)006:2183: sems nyid gshis kyi don de mthong ba la //
NK106(me)006:2184: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK106(me)006:2188: rdzogs pa chen po la sogs ming ci btags kyang /
NK106(me)006:2189: don ngo bo gcig ste rig pa byang chub kyi sems kun byed nam mkha' lta bu'o //
NK106(me)006:2192: kun byed nga yi rang bzhin gcig pu la //
NK106(me)006:2193: 'khor gyi 'dod pa rnams kyis ming btags pa //
NK106(me)006:2194: la las byang chub sems su ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2195: la las nam mkha'i khams su ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2196: la las rang byung ye shes ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2197: la las chos kyi sku ru ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2198: la las longs spyod rdzogs par ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2199: la las sprul pa'i sku ru ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2200: la las thams cad mkhyen par ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2201: la las rnam pa thams cad ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2202: la las ye shes bzhi dang gsum du btags //
NK106(me)006:2203: la las ye shes lnga ru ming yang btags //
NK106(me)006:2204: la las dbyings dang ye shes ming btags pa //
NK106(me)006:2205: rang byung byang chub sems ni gcig la btags //
NK106(me)006:2206: rang byung nga la mthong tshad smras pa yin //
NK106(me)006:2208: rtogs pa blo 'das chen por don bsdu ba ni /
NK106(me)006:2209: phyogs ris ma 'dzin grub matha'i gzeb las 'das //
NK106(me)006:2210: blo bral gnyis med mnyam rdzogs chen po ste //
NK106(me)006:2211: rgyal ba'i dgongs pa mtha' grol klong yangs su //
NK106(me)006:2212: rnal 'byor rnams kyis yongs su shes par bya //
NK106(me)006:2213: gnas lugs mthong ba'i ngo bo ni theg pa dang
NK106(me)006:2214: grub matha'i yid dpyod kyis mi rtogs te tshig dang
NK106(me)006:2215: tha snyad kyi yul las 'das pa'i phyir dang /
NK106(me)006:2216: mos sgom don spyi yul las 'das te blo bral
NK106(me)006:2217: gnyis med nam mkha' ltar bsam brjod las pa'i phyir
NK106(me)006:2218: ro // 'o na ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
NK106(me)006:2221: dpe ni nam mkha' lta bur brtag /
NK106(me)006:2222: don ni chos nyid skye ba med //
NK106(me)006:2223: rtogs na sems nyid 'gag pa med //
NK106(me)006:2224: nam mkha' lta bu'i chos nyid la //
NK106(me)006:2225: nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon //
NK106(me)006:2227: de lta bu'i don la 'gag bsdu bas nyams su len na /
NK106(me)006:2228: rang sems bcos bslad med pa'i ngang der re dogs
NK106(me)006:2229: 'bad rtsol zhig pas rang gsal zang ka rjen par
NK106(me)006:2232: kye sems dpa' chen po rang sems grub 'dod na //
NK106(me)006:2233: 'dod pa med pas grub pa yin pa'i phyir //
NK106(me)006:2234: rtog med mnyam pa nyid la gnas mi byed //
NK106(me)006:2235: blang dor med pa'i yul la rang bzhin gnas //
NK106(me)006:2236: g.yos pa med pa'i ngang la ngang gis gnas //
NK106(me)006:2237: sems ni ji bzhin pa yi ngo bo ste //
NK106(me)006:2238: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin nyid du grub //
NK106(me)006:2239: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par ma byed cig /
NK106(me)006:2240: ngo bo nyid las gzhan du ma bsgrubs shig /
NK106(me)006:2241: btsal na rgyal bas dbyings nas mi rnyed 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:2242: sngar byas zin pas da ni byed mi dgos //
NK106(me)006:2243: sngar grub zin pas da ni sgrub mi dgos //
NK106(me)006:2244: mi rtog cir mi dgongs la mnyam par zhog /
NK106(me)006:2245: kye sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /
NK106(me)006:2246: snga rabs 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang //
NK106(me)006:2247: rang gi sems las gzhan du chos btsal med //
NK106(me)006:2248: ji bzhin pa la 'chos par byed pa myong //
NK106(me)006:2249: ting 'dzin rnam par rtog pa sgom myong //
NK106(me)006:2250: rang sems mi rtog pa yi sgrub pa yin //
NK106(me)006:2251: da ltar bzhugs dang slad kyis 'byon pa yang //
NK106(me)006:2252: rtog med mnyam pa nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur //
NK106(me)006:2254: don bzhi pa 'bras bu bstan pa ni /
NK106(me)006:2255: de dag mthar phyin 'bras bu rim pa ni //
NK106(me)006:2256: gnas skabs bde gsal mi rtog zung 'jug gis //
NK106(me)006:2257: spyan dang mngon shes yon tan dpag med cing //
NK106(me)006:2258: mthar thug sku gsum yid bzhin rgyal chos 'grub //
NK106(me)006:2259: rang gzhan don gnyis lhun gyis grub pa yin //
NK106(me)006:2260: lam mthar gyis legs par bsgoms pa las /
NK106(me)006:2261: gnas skabs su bde gsal mi rtog pa'i ting nge
NK106(me)006:2262: 'dzin grub pas spyan dang mngon shes la sogs pa
NK106(me)006:2263: 'grub cing mthar thug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub ste
NK106(me)006:2264: / sku gsum ye shes dang bcas pas 'khor ba ji srid par sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2265: de yang chos sku nam mkha' 'dra ba'i ngang nas /
NK106(me)006:2266: gzugs sku nyi zla 'dra ba shar te don mdzad pa yang /
NK106(me)006:2268: sku gsum dag gi sangs rgyas kyis //
NK106(me)006:2269: don 'di rten dang bcas pa yin //
NK106(me)006:2272: chos kyi sku las ma g.yos par //
NK106(me)006:2273: sprul pa'i rang bzhin sna tshogs kyis //
NK106(me)006:2274: skye ba mngon par skye ba dang //
NK106(me)006:2275: dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho ba dang //
NK106(me)006:2276: lhums su 'jug dang bltams pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2277: bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2278: btsun mo'i 'khor dgyes rol pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2279: nges 'byung dka' ba spyod pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2280: byang chub snying por gshegs pa dang //
NK106(me)006:2281: bdud sde bcom dang rdzogs par ni //
NK106(me)006:2282: byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo dang //
NK106(me)006:2283: mya ngan 'da' bar gshegs pa rnams //
NK106(me)006:2284: yongs su ma dag zhing rnams su //
NK106(me)006:2285: srid pa ji srid gnas par ston //
NK106(me)006:2288: gang gi srid pa ji srid par //
NK106(me)006:2289: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag /
NK106(me)006:2290: mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
NK106(me)006:2291: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
NK106(me)006:2293: las ni rgyun mi 'chad pa yin //
NK106(me)006:2295: dri med rdul bral byang chub snying po'i lam //
NK106(me)006:2296: zhi ba rab bzang phan bde 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK106(me)006:2297: rab dkar dam pa sngon du mdzad nas kyang //
NK106(me)006:2298: sa steng rgyan gyur gong de'i rjes 'gro shog /
NK106(me)006:2299: chu gtsang me tog bung ba snyan sgrog cing //
NK106(me)006:2300: rma bya gar byed pad+ma lhag ge ba //
NK106(me)006:2301: drang srong dka' thub dpal gyis mdzes pa der //
NK106(me)006:2302: gcig pu zhi ba'i gnam g.yogs 'dzin par shog /
NK106(me)006:2303: sdug bsngal yongs gang srid pa'i me 'obs las //
NK106(me)006:2304: ting 'dzin grub pa bsam gtan chu bsil gyis //
NK106(me)006:2305: ma lus 'gro ba zag med bder gyur te //
NK106(me)006:2306: zhi bde thar pa'i gnas su 'dren par shog /
NK106(me)006:2307: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta rnam dag las /
NK106(me)006:2308: gang bsgom pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa bstan pa la ste rdo rje'i gnas gsum pa'o ////
NK106(me)006:2309: da ni bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa mjug gi don bstan pa las dge ba bsngo ba ni /
NK106(me)006:2310: de ltar chos tshul zhi ba snying po'i don //
NK106(me)006:2311: zab cing rgya che bshad pa'i bsod nams des //
NK106(me)006:2312: 'gro kun byang chub dam pa gnyis thob nas //
NK106(me)006:2313: yid bzhin 'phrin las 'byor pa mtha' yas shog /
NK106(me)006:2314: chos kyi tshul rmad du byung ba legs par bkod pa'i bsod nams kyis /
NK106(me)006:2315: sems can thams cad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams
NK106(me)006:2316: dang ye shes kyi 'byor pa mtha' yas pas brgyan
NK106(me)006:2317: pa'i go 'phang thob par shog cig ces pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2318: gang gis gang du ji ltar bkod pa'i tshul brjod pa ni /
NK106(me)006:2319: 'di ni rgyal sras dri med 'od zer gyis //
NK106(me)006:2320: rang gi nyams len gnad dril bcud bsdus te //
NK106(me)006:2321: phyi rabs don du gsal bar bshad pa ni //
NK106(me)006:2322: gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod //
NK106(me)006:2323: dpal o rgyan gyi slob dpon chen po pad+ma rgyal
NK106(me)006:2324: po'i chos kyi sras su gyur pa mang du thos
NK106(me)006:2325: pa'i blo gros dri ma med pa'i 'od zer mnga'
NK106(me)006:2326: bas / rang bzhin rdzogs pa chen po'i gnad las /
NK106(me)006:2327: man ngag gi gnad rang gis myong ba rnams bsdus te /
NK106(me)006:2328: phyi rabs kyi don du ri'i rgyal po gangs ri thod dkar gyi mgul du bkod pa'o //
NK106(me)006:2329: gzhan don brtson pa la gdams pa ni /
NK106(me)006:2330: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis brtson byas shing //
NK106(me)006:2331: yi ge 'di bzhin nyams su blang bar mdzod //
NK106(me)006:2332: gnas skabs mthar thug don gnyis phun tshogs te //
NK106(me)006:2333: bde chen gling du myur du dga' bde byed //
NK106(me)006:2334: phyi rabs thar pa bsgrub pa dag gis yi ge 'di'i don bsgom pa la brtson par bya ste /
NK106(me)006:2335: nyin mtshan du nyams su blangs pas myur du rang
NK106(me)006:2336: gzhan gyi don gnyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'grub nas
NK106(me)006:2337: bde chen byang chub mchog gi 'byor pa dam pas
NK106(me)006:2340: brtson la byang chub 'di gnas kyi //
NK106(me)006:2341: mi brtson pa la gnas ma yin //
NK106(me)006:2343: mthar phyin pa gzhug gi don bstan zin to //
NK106(me)006:2344: de ltar legs bshad bsod nams sprin chen gyis //
NK106(me)006:2345: ma lus 'gro rgyud skye bo'i mkhar khyab ste //
NK106(me)006:2346: don gnyis phun tshogs phan bde'i char babs pas //
NK106(me)006:2347: mngon par byang chub 'byor pa mtha' yas shog /
NK106(me)006:2348: lam ngan nas ni nges par 'byung ba gang //
NK106(me)006:2349: shing rta rnam dag rdo rje snying po'i don //
NK106(me)006:2350: zab cing rgya che dam pa 'dir zhugs te //
NK106(me)006:2351: 'gro kun thar pa'i grong du phyin par shog /
NK106(me)006:2352: chos tshul 'di ni 'od stong nyin mor byed //
NK106(me)006:2353: lung rig man ngag dkyil 'khor bzang po ste //
NK106(me)006:2354: yid mkha'i mun pa ma lus sel ba dang //
NK106(me)006:2355: mnyam du byang chub pad+mo rgyas byed yin //
NK106(me)006:2356: skye ba sngon rabs rnams su yang dang yang //
NK106(me)006:2357: 'di 'dra'i tshul la blo mig rab sbyangs pas //
NK106(me)006:2358: 'dir yang mdo rgyud man ngag snying po'i don //
NK106(me)006:2359: ma lus dbang 'byor zab don kun la mkhas //
NK106(me)006:2360: tshul khrims dri med dngas pa'i nam mkha' la //
NK106(me)006:2361: blo gros gtso bor stong ldan shar ba yis //
NK106(me)006:2362: sna tshogs klong chen pad+mo rab rgyas shing //
NK106(me)006:2363: rang grol rab 'byams snang ba phyogs bcur shar //
NK106(me)006:2364: gang gi sngon gyi skye bo dam pa'i lugs //
NK106(me)006:2365: mi dbang yang dag phul gyi rjes 'gro ba //
NK106(me)006:2366: rang byung pad+mas byin gyis brlabs pa des //
NK106(me)006:2367: gangs ri thod dkar mgul du legs par bkod //
NK106(me)006:2368: shing rta rnam dag rdo rje rtse mo'i srol //
NK106(me)006:2369: tshig don rnam bkra'i bkod pas nyer mdzes shing //
NK106(me)006:2370: rnam grol thar lam bzhon pa mchog gyur 'dis //
NK106(me)006:2371: skal bzang skye bo'i tshogs rnams dga' bar mdzod //
NK106(me)006:2372: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan ngal gso'i 'grel pa shing rta rnam dag ces bya ba /
NK106(me)006:2373: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i gnas la mang du
NK106(me)006:2374: sbyangs pa'i rnal 'byor pa klong chen rab 'byams kyis
